106b2(khri brgyad): lags/ stong pa nyid kyang yi ge rnams lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sada' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ yi ge
106b3(khri brgyad): rnams la gnas par mi 'gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chena'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong pas/ gzugs mi rtag zhes ba gyi b.rags
106b4(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyi'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rta go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi gyi'o//  ci'i slad du no na/ brjes 'di lhur gzugs mi
106b5(khri brgyad): rtag pa ni gzugs mi rtag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de mi rtag pa nyid ma lags la/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang mi rtag pa ma mchis te/ 
106b6(khri brgyad): mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa nyid lags pa'i slad de'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' se 'a chen po shes rab kyi pa
106b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma rtag ces 'argya
106b8(khri brgyad): bar gnas par mi gyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa ni rnam pa'i shes pa mi rtag pa nga nyid kyis stong ste mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid
107a1(khri brgyad): gang lags pa de mi rtag pa nyid ma lags la// stong pa nyid las gud na yang mi rtag pa nyid ma mchis te/ mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa nyid
107a2(khri brgyad): lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa la gnas par
107a3(khri brgyad): mi bgyi'o// de bzhin du gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / dben zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi
107a4(khri brgyad): bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bang nga/ med pa dang / zhi ba dang / sdong ba dang / mtshan ma/ 
107a5(khri brgyad): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / deben zhes pa rgyo tha~Mr gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du ni ni/ bcom ldan 'ad/ 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i dben pa na rnam pa
107a6(khri brgyad): nga'i dben pas stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i dben pa nyid gang lags pa de/ rnam par shes pa ma lags la/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang dben pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par
107a7(khri brgyad): shes pa nyid kyang dben pa lags/ dben pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
107a8(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po / 
107b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ bcortse ldan 'das de bzhin
107b2(khri brgyad): nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de/ de bzhin nyid ma lags la/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang de bzhin nyid ma mchis te/ de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin
107b3(khri brgyad): nyid lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de bzhin nyid la gnas pa
107b4(khri brgyad): mi bgyi'o// de bzhin du chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos ga nas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag dpe'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan
107b5(khri brgyad): 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzungs kyi sgo thams kyi nga la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na 'di
107b6(khri brgyad): ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgos stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de/ gzungs kyi sgom lags la/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzungs
107b7(khri brgyad): sgo ma mchis te/ gzus kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
107b8(khri brgyad): chen po shes ra kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po
108a1(khri brgyad): khab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas// gal te nga 'dzin pa dang / nga yi 'dzin par ltung ba'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon
108a2(khri brgyad): par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lag so// gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas na de rnam
108a3(khri brgyad): par shes pa mngon par 'du gyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon pa bdu brdzi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub
108a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa mi logs/ shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
108a5(khri brgyad): pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shos/ rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par ma gyur/ bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par
108a6(khri brgyad): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te ngar 'chi
108a7(khri brgyad): budang / nga yir 'dzin par ltung ba'i yid kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas na/ de mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lag so// 
108a8(khri brgyad): na ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'dub gyi bal spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa ma lagaso// shes rib kyi pha rol tu
108b1(khri brgyad): byin pa yong su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par ma gyur / 
108b2(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
108b3(khri brgyad): spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par ltung ba'i yid kyis de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin cid
108b4(khri brgyad): dang / chos nyid dang / chos gyi sa dang / chos gnas b+h+ring / chos sbyin med pazhid dang / yang dag pa'i mthara' la gnas mde mngan par 'du'i gyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/ 
108b5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
108b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa la bsgom pa mi lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su 'dzin pa ma legs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shes
108b7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'i
108b8(khri brgyad): ltar gzugs ni yong su gzus pa ma mchis/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni yo su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 
109a1(khri brgyad): / gzugs kyi yong su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas/ gzugs ma lags shing tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams
109a2(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa'i yongasu gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas/ rnam par shes pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// yang dge pa'i mtha
109a3(khri brgyad): bar ni yong su gzung ba ma mchis pa ldag so// yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongasu gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
109a4(khri brgyad): ma lags pa'i slad du'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ya/ nga rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yongasu gzung ba ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
109a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par rjebartag par bgyi ste/ ci nas chos gang la yang
109a6(khri brgyad): yid rnam par rgyu bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar yo su brtog par 'gyi'o// bcom ldan 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chos bam
109a7(khri brgyad): cad yongasu ma bzung ba zhes bgyi ba ste/ rgya che ba phul du thung ba/ tshad ma mchis pa nges pa/ mau 'bregs pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa ste/ 
109a8(khri brgyad): ting 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur lag so// rnam pa thams
109b1(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang nang song ba nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong bzhing stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'das
109b2(khri brgyad): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin
109b3(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / 
109b4(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongasu gzung ba ma mchis pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni mtshan mar brjod pa ma lags te/ 'di ltar mtshan ma ni nyon mongs
109b5(khri brgyad): pa lags pa'i slad du'o// mtshan ma gang lags zhe na/ gzu gas ni mtshan ma lag so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni
109b6(khri brgyad): mtshan ma lag so// mig ni mtshan ma lag so// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mtshan ma lag so// gzugs ni mtshan ma lag so// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang
109b7(khri brgyad): chos rnams ni mtshan ma lag so// mig rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma lag so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / 
109b8(khri brgyad): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa na mtshan ma lag so// mig 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma yigaso// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te / 
110a1(khri brgyad): pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma lag so// mig 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba
110a2(khri brgyad): ni mtshan ma lag so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las thung ba'i tshor ba dang / 
110a3(khri brgyad): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma lag so// sa'i khams ni mtshan ma lag so// chu'i khams da/ 
110a4(khri brgyad): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma lag so// ma rig pa ni mtshan ma lag so// 'du byed dang / 
110a5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mtsho drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shin
110a6(khri brgyad): mtshan ma lag so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / pa
110a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma
110a8(khri brgyad): mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzu
110b1(khri brgyad): kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma lag so// yi ge rnams ni mtshan ma lag so// gcig brjod pa ni mtshan ma lag so// gnyis brjod pa ni mtshan ma lag so// tha dad par brjod pa ni
110b2(khri brgyad): mtshan ma lag so// mngon par shes pa ni mtshan ma lag so// ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad ni mtshan ma lags te/ de ni nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi'o// gal te shes
110b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mtshan mar gzung bar bgyi ba zhig lags na ni/ kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs bstan pa 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de la dad pa thob par mi 'gyur
110b4(khri brgyad): lag so// dad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pa dang / rtog pa dang / mos pa dang / brten pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod pa ste/ de
110b5(khri brgyad): yang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul du yang ma lag so// de ltar de ni mtshan ma/ dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / gzung ba ma mchis
110b6(khri brgyad): par gzung bar bgyi ba lags te/ kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos nas dad par rjesu 'brang bas nyi tshe ba'i shes pas zhugs te/ de zhugs nas/ 
110b7(khri brgyad): gzugs yongasu ma bzung / de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu ma bzung ba lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des rang gi mtshan nyid
110b8(khri brgyad): kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la yong su 'dzin pa po ma dmigs pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des shes pa de thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa lags par nang du
111a1(khri brgyad): yang dag par rje su ma mthong // phyi rol tu yang dag par rje su ma mthong / shes pa de thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa lags par phyi nang du yang dag par rje su ma mthong
111a2(khri brgyad): shes pa de thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa lags par gzhan du yang dag par rje sum mthong ba'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang gis rtogs par 'gyid pa dang / gang
111a3(khri brgyad): rtogs par bgyid pa dang / gang rtogs par bgyid pa'i chos de ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ shes pa de gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par rje su ma mthong / shes pa tshar
111a4(khri brgyad): ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rje su ma mthong / shes pa de gzugs kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjesu ma mthong / shes pa de tshe
111a5(khri brgyad): ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rje su ma mthong / shes bde ga/ thugs kyi nang dang / phyi rol tu yang dag par rje su ma mthong / 
111a6(khri brgyad): shes pa de tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i nang dang / phyi rol tu yang dag par rje sum mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de gzugs las
111a7(khri brgyad): gzhan du yang dag par rje su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las gzhon du yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba'i slad du'o// de baN+DI
111a8(khri brgyad): du shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi nang du yang dag par rje su ma mthong / shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rje su ma mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ 
111b1(khri brgyad): shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha' las gzhan du yang dag par rje sum mthong ba'i slad du'o// rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs mos par gyur te/ de 'dir mos nas dad pas rjesu 'brang bas
111b2(khri brgyad): chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur te/ de de ltar mos nas des chos gang yang ma
111b3(khri brgyad): ma ma mchis par yid la bgyid pa'i slad du chos gang yang yongasasu bzung ba ma mchis lag so// chos thams cad bzung du ma mchis pa dang / btang du ma mchis pa'i slad du des gang
111b4(khri brgyad): yongasu bgyi ba 'am/ btang bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos gang yang nga ma dmigs te/ chos thams cad la rlom sems ma ma chis pa'i slad du de ni mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom
111b5(khri brgyad): semasu 'gyur ba ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das cho sa thams cad yong su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad dung / nga gzugs yongasu mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du
111b6(khri brgyad): shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongasu bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs mi 'dzin pa de ni/ 
111b7(khri brgyad): gzhan gyi pha rol tu mchis pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lag so// de ni smon lam dag yongasu ma rdzogs shing / sangs rgyas
111b8(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dge yong su ma rdzogs kyi bar du// bar mdor yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da' lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ smon lam de dag smon lam ma lags
112a1(khri brgyad): stobs de dag stobs ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa de dag mi 'jigs pa ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag so so yang dag par rig pa ma lags shing
112a2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/ de dag ni chos kyang ma lags/ chos ma lags pa yang ma lags pa'i sadu'o// bcos
112a3(khri brgyad): chos thams cad yongasu bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du gang gzugs yong su mi 'dzin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du mi 'dzin pa de ni gzhan gyis pha rol tu mchi bas/ 
112a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lag so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa// / bam po bdun
112a5(khri brgyad): // bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang tu chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ 'di ltar yongasu 'jug
112a6(khri brgyad): bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang gi/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
112a7(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig na zhes yongasu brtag par bgyi'o// de de ltar yong su rtog cing de ltar nges par sems pa'i tshe/ gal te chos ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa gang lags
112a8(khri brgyad): ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags par yang dag par rje su mthong na/ de lags par mthong ba leg so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thang ni ma mchis shing mi
112b1(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i slada'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos gang dag med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ 
112b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam
112b3(khri brgyad): pastong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong
112b4(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo
112b5(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmig so// bsam gtan
112b6(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing
112b7(khri brgyad): mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang med cing mi dmig so// 
112b8(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ gzugs med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 
113a1(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmig so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du med cing mi dmig so// mngon
113a2(khri brgyad): par shes pa med cing mi dmig so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du med cing mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs// tshe dang ldan
113a3(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med cing mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i Ta rgyun tu
113a4(khri brgyad): zhugs pa yang med cing mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang med cing mi
113a5(khri brgyad): dmig so// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo ni de stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ thams cad shes pa nyi kyang med cing mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa
113a6(khri brgyad): da mkhyen pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa gal te sems mi nu
113a7(khri brgyad): mi 'god la mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang lda
113a8(khri brgyad): pa shA ri 'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma
113b1(khri brgyad): bral bar rig par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
113b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i
113b3(khri brgyad): rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha/ 
113b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / na 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi po rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
113b5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ tshe dang ldan shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi
113b6(khri brgyad): rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' yang yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ 
113b7(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhini ji lta bu yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ 
113b8(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu// gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ngos
114a1(khri brgyad): / po med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar gzugs
114a2(khri brgyad): ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du yang
114a3(khri brgyad): dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral bar rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// 
114a4(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// // de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag
114a5(khri brgyad): pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyang ma tshan nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// 
114a6(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par du
114a7(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhino// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni/ rnam
114a8(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes shing 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro// 
114b1(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ni ma skyes shing nges par 'byung ba med pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bugazu
114b2(khri brgyad): ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba dang / nges par 'byung ba mi dmig so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la
114b3(khri brgyad): skye ba dang / nges par 'byung ba mi dmig so// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ de la skye ba dang / nges par 'byung ba mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
114b4(khri brgyad): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no// ji lta ji ltar
114b5(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba ra gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yong su dag pa dang / ngag yo ngasu dag pa dang / sems yong su dag pa dang / mtshan
114b6(khri brgyad): yongasu dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar lus yong su dag pa dang / ngag yong su dag pa dang / sems yongasu dag pa dang / mtshan
114b7(khri brgyad): yongasu dag pa thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar 'dod chags dang / ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed// zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / nga rgyal dang / ldan pa dang / sgyu dang g.ye dang ldan pa dang / phrag
114b8(khri brgyad): dog dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / chags pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do// de 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed cing / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / 
115a1(khri brgyad): sku dang / g.yo dang / ser sna dang / chags dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed pas/ nam yang ma'i mngal du mi skye zhing / rtag par rgyun tu brdzus
115a2(khri brgyad): te skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i ched ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams mi skye'o// de sems can rnams yong su smin par byed la sangs rgyas
115a3(khri brgyad): kyi zhing yongasasu dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du
115a4(khri brgyad): nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral ba/ dmi 'gyur// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon
115a5(khri brgyad): tan dang phan yon de dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes ra kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson pa mi btang bar smra/ de bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang
115a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no// shes rob kyi pha
115a7(khri brgyad): ral tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyi le'u zhes bya ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di
115a8(khri brgyad): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gal te thabs la mi mkhas pas gzugs
115b1(khri brgyad): la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lag so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
115b2(khri brgyad): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lag so// gal te gzugs rtag ces bgyi ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
115b3(khri brgyad): ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rtag ces bgyi ba
115b4(khri brgyad): 'am/ mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lag so// gal te gzugs la bde zhes
115b5(khri brgyad): bgyi 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtsho na ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang 'du sa dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la
115b6(khri brgyad): khade zhes 'gyi ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gzugs la bdag ces bgyi ba 'am/ bdag ma mchis shes bgyi bar spyod/ 
115b7(khri brgyad): mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag ces bgyi ba 'am/ bdag ma mchis shes brgya
115b8(khri brgyad): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la zhi zhes 'gyi ba 'am/ mi zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang 'du
116a1(khri brgyad): / shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzug
116a2(khri brgyad): la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la
116a3(khri brgyad): dben zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags// bcom ldan 'das byang
116a4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsi bdu
116a5(khri brgyad): la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ de bzhin du ma/ ngon par shes pa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mig lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / mi
116a6(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa rnams dang / sasu rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dag la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lagra
116a7(khri brgyad): so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
116a8(khri brgyad): spyod de snyam du sems ni/ dmigs pa la spyod pa lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan mi nyid la spyod pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
116b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin/ 
116b2(khri brgyad): snyam du sems na/ de mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa lags te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thibs la mi mkhas par rig par bgyi ba lag so// shA ri'i bus smras
116b3(khri brgyad): ga tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
116b4(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu byung dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ltar gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ tshor ba dang 'du
116b5(khri brgyad): shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la// gnas shing / kun tu shes te mos na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin/ tshor ba
116b6(khri brgyad): dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin/ de ni de'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa
116b7(khri brgyad): dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa byed pa yin no zhes kho bo smra'o// gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
116b8(khri brgyad): byin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas gal te mig lo gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas shing kun tu shes
117a1(khri brgyad): te mos/ gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos la gnas shi gas tu shes te sos/ mig rnas pa
117a2(khri brgyad): pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi
117a3(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ grul tan pa dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus
117a4(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ 
117a5(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te kha dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi
117a6(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos
117a7(khri brgyad): gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ mig lnga dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang mi
117a8(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa bzhi dang // tshad med pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la
117b1(khri brgyad): gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / byang
117b2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/ mngon par 'du byed pa la skyed pa ni
117b3(khri brgyad): skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dren pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang // 'khrug pa dag las yongasu mi thar zhing / sdug
117b4(khri brgyad): bsngal la sogs pa las yongs mi 'grol lo zhes kho bo smra'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon
117b5(khri brgyad): sum du bya ba'i skal pa yang med na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lta ga la 'gyur te/ de ni gnas
117b6(khri brgyad): med de// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i Ta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya'o// 
117b7(khri brgyad): ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na thabs la mkhas par rig par bya/ rab
117b8(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ gzugs la mi sbyod // tshor ba dang
118a1(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi sbyongad / gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam/ 
118a2(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin du gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / 'dri zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ci
118a3(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / ni zhes bya ba dang / mo zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor rab dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nag ces bya ba dang / 
118a4(khri brgyad): mi rtag ces bya ba dang / 'od zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsnga la zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod
118a5(khri brgyad): gzugs snang zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces/ ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces
118a6(khri brgyad): bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma
118a7(khri brgyad): med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs dpon zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi drodzi na zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
118a8(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod// mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
118b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin/ 
118b2(khri brgyad): pa/ de ni gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs med/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa
118b3(khri brgyad): nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang / rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa
118b4(khri brgyad): nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid
118b5(khri brgyad): kyang rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang lnga na pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
118b6(khri brgyad): rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
118b7(khri brgyad): dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas
118b8(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs
119a1(khri brgyad): chen po shes pa kyi chos tu phyin pa la des spyod ni/ babs las ngas par ga pa byo'o// mye napa du rtsa du so ma sa chen
119a2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal pa yod pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
119a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa de/ gal te chos 'ga' zhig kha sa len na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khas mi len na yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
119a4(khri brgyad): la spyod pa ma yin no// khas len kyang len la khas mi len kyang mi len na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khas len pa yang ma yin
119a5(khri brgyad): khas mi len pa yang ma yin na yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
119a6(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ ci'i phyir khas mi lon/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo
119a7(khri brgyad): nyid med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub
119b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ mi spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi
119b2(khri brgyad): spyod do ces bya bar khas mi len/ spyod pa yang ma yin// mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar khas mi len to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang
119b3(khri brgyad): bzhin du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin no// rnam pa thams
119b4(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su dbyer med de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
119b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting 'dzin chos thams cad skye/ ba med pa zhes bya ste/ rgya che ba phul du bya ba/ tshad me dang nges pa mi 'phrogs po/ nyan thos dang / rang sas
119b6(khri brgyad): rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa ste/ ting 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
119b7(khri brgyad): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor ting 'dzin 'di kho nas gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du
119b8(khri brgyad): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ 'on te ting 'dzin gzhan dag gis kyang 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
120a1(khri brgyad): ri'i bu ting 'dzin gzhan dag gis gnas pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
120a2(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting 'dzin gzhan dag gis gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med
120a3(khri brgyad): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'drang rgya bu de dag gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
120a4(khri brgyad): da' chen po rnams kyi ting 'dzin dpe rab 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ ting 'dzin des gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
120a5(khri brgyad): ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya bi'i ting 'dzin/ dang / seng+ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 
120a6(khri brgyad): zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams ca da las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin dang / 
120a7(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / spyi gsug rnam po a ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya thol ting 'dzin dang / nges
120a8(khri brgyad): ba'i rgya ba mtshan tog ces bya bo'i ting 'dzin dang / rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang
120b1(khri brgyad): ting 'dzin gyis rgyal po ltar shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting
120b2(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / brtson 'grus kyi
120b3(khri brgyad): stos shes bya ba'i ting lin dang / yang dag lags pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la gadrin mi tho bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 
120b4(khri brgyad): tshig bla dwags la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting/  'dzin dang / phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'iting 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i
120b5(khri brgyad): ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag bar 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / na mkhara' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
120b6(khri brgyad): dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / dbang po'i tog ces byaba'i ting 'dzin dang / 
120b7(khri brgyad): rgyun gyi rjesu song ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par sgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin dang / snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che spong ba zhes bya ba'i
120b8(khri brgyad): ting 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / tshel ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / gnas la brten po med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / sems
121a1(khri brgyad): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 'od byed
121a2(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / dga'
121a3(khri brgyad): 'byed po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / zang mi shes pazlos bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / ga
121a4(khri brgyad): brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / mi go yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i
121a5(khri brgyad): ting 'dzin dang / nyi mi'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ti/ 'i 'dzin dang / shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge
121a6(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / ye shes tog ces
121a7(khri brgyad): pa'i tingange 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang // kun tu snang po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas
121a8(khri brgyad): ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rin tshon mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya
121b1(khri brgyad): ba'i ting 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags shing rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rnam par mthor ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 
121b2(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam bur 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / 
121b3(khri brgyad): dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rnam por shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / ming nges par 'jug pa cu
121b4(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rang rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting dzin
121b5(khri brgyad): dang / g.yo ba med pa zhes pa pa'i ting 'dzin dang /  lo las brgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogasu gyur pa zhes bye ba'i ting nge
121b6(khri brgyad): dang / sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
121b7(khri brgyad): dang / spongs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 
121b8(khri brgyad): yong su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / gnasu bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / bkod pa gcig pa zhes
122a1(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rnam pa cig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rnam pa dor ba med pa zhes bya
122a2(khri brgyad): ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rtogs pas srid pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / brda' dang sgra thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / sgra dbyings
122a3(khri brgyad): kyi yi ge thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / mo'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongasu sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / bzod pa rnyog pa med
122a4(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad kyicho ga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa
122a5(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i zla mA tog ces bya ba'i ti 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo / sa shes bya ba'i tI 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa/ 
122a6(khri brgyad): thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bo zhes bya ba'o ting 'dzin dang / 'thun pa dang 'gal ba zhes
122a7(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / zla bzhi ba'i 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 
122a8(khri brgyad): glog gi 'ad ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 'jig rten thams cad du'ong byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / ting la ni mnyam
122b1(khri brgyad): nyid ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / sgra med pa dang / sgra dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba
122b2(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / gnas la rten pa med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la
122b3(khri brgyad): gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas na mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes
122b4(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / namakha'i ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing du la zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ngag yod de/ ting 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub
122b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med/ pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rje gus par 'tshang rgya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag
122b6(khri brgyad): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting 'dzin te/ ting 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
122b7(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ gang la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
122b8(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 
123a1(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rag byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu a la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ti 'dzin de dag gis
123a2(khri brgyad): gnas pa de ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan ci
123a3(khri brgyad): da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te/ 
123a4(khri brgyad): zhing bzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung ston
123a5(khri brgyad): par rig par bya ste/ ting 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa/ des na/ ting 'dzin kyang yang dag par rje su mi mthong bdag ni snyoms par zhug so// bdag ni snyoms par 'jug
123a6(khri brgyad): go/ bdag ni snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba des na/ ting 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la
123a7(khri brgyad): rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cang mi 'byung ngo // shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ting 'dzin de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
123a8(khri brgyad): chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan du yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i sa
123b1(khri brgyad): de ni med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ ting 'dzin kyang gzhan zhing / byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes
123b2(khri brgyad): bya ba med kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting 'dzin yin la/ tinge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang
123b3(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems
123b4(khri brgyad): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin la/ ting 'dzin kyang ga/ zhan ma yin te/ ting 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting 'dzin
123b5(khri brgyad): yin na/ tinge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byo ra gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ro'i bu de ni ma yin no// shU ri ri bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
123b6(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu des ci ting 'dzin de dag kun tu shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kun tu shes pa medo// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
123b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor ji ltar kun tu shes pa med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed pa lta ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar
123b8(khri brgyad): rnam par rtog par mi byed/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir de lta'i ting 'dzin de dag pa la rnam par rtog par mi byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 
124a1(khri brgyad): rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi bu des ting 'dzin de dag rnam par mi shes shing kun tu sheso// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na des rnam
124a2(khri brgyad): par mi shes shing kun tu mi shes/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting 'dzin de dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de med pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par
124a3(khri brgyad): mi shes shing / kun tu mi sheso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor ji ltar ngas nyan thos nyon mongs po med par
124a4(khri brgyad): gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa khyod kyis ba sha da pa ni de yin te/ tshig de dag legs par smras pa ni leg so leg so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
124a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu byin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
124a6(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum du
124a7(khri brgyad): rtsa bdun po dag la bslab par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la yang de ltar bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
124a8(khri brgyad): bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags sa ma/ bcom ldan pa/ 
124b1(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i chub
124b2(khri brgyad): gyis slob bo// de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 'ang / 
124b3(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob ste/ de yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu cu bdun po de dag la slob ste/ de yang mi dmigs/ 
124b4(khri brgyad): ba'i tshul gyis slob po// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la slob ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe
124b5(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
124b6(khri brgyad): pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
124b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no// ra shA ri 'iri bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis
124b8(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmig so// shes pa'o// mthong ba po'i bar du mi dmigaso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung po dang // khams
125a1(khri brgyad): dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmig so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigaso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'thung
125a2(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mi dmig so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs// shin
125a3(khri brgyad): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag mi dmig so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar
125a4(khri brgyad): dag mi dmig so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun tu zhugs pa mi dmigs// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyi ro lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra
125a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmig so// shin tu rna ma par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi dmig so// shA
125a6(khri brgyad): ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos thams cad kyi skyo ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa
125a7(khri brgyad): dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmig su med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// 
125a8(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dag slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
125b1(khri brgyad): sa ma byung du ma pa sas dab chen byon pas gangs yang sa rlob ma dang 'byo shes 'i chos das nga/ 
125b2(khri brgyad): so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen pa de lta bur yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di dag ji lta bur mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan
125b3(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar med pa de ltar yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mchog
125b4(khri brgyad): pa ma lags pa la ma rig pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom de ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi
125b5(khri brgyad): phyir gzugs yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
125b6(khri brgyad): pa yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel por 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa
125b7(khri brgyad): pa rnams yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod pa ma yin/ nang stong po nyid
125b8(khri brgyad): dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yod pa ma yin no// de la byis pa gang dag ma rig pa dang / 
126a1(khri brgyad): sred pa dag gis mngon par zhen pa de dag gis yod pa ma yin pa la brtags te/ yod pa ma yin pa la mngon par zhen nas/ 'di lta ste rtag pa dang chad pa'i
126a2(khri brgyad): mtha' gnyis chags pas na/ de dag mi shes mi mthong ba ste/ de dag gis chos gang dag yod pa ma yin pa'i chos de dag yongasu brtags pas/ ming dang gzugs la mngon
126a3(khri brgyad): par zhen cing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la yang mngon par zhen to// de dag de ltar
126a4(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen pas na yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la rtog par byed pa'i phyir de dag mi shes mi mthong ba yin no// ci zhig mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes
126a5(khri brgyad): mi mthong ngo // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed na/ mas dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung
126a6(khri brgyad): ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag mi shes mi mthong bas// de'i phyir byis pa zhes bya ba
126a7(khri brgyad): grangasu 'gro ba yin no// de dag ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/ gang nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs kyu khamra
126a8(khri brgyad): nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nges par 'thung ba ma yin// 
126b1(khri brgyad): de dag ni ma ngad pa yin te/ ci zhig la ma dad ce na/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar ma dad pa nas/ byang chub ni byang chub kyis stong zhes bya ba'i bar dag la ma dad pa yin no// de dag
126b2(khri brgyad): ni mi gnas pa yin te/ ci zhig la mi gnas pa zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mo gnaso// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brjod pa'i'o pha rol tu phyin pa dag / brtson 'grus kyi
126b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gan so// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mi gan so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi
126b4(khri brgyad): bar dag la mi gnas pa yin te/ de'i phyir byis pa rnams shes bya'o// de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ci zhig la mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen
126b5(khri brgyad): pa yin no// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang // rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yino// mig la mngon par zhen pa yin no//  ba dang sna dang lce dang lus
126b6(khri brgyad): dang / yid la mngon par zhen pa yin no// gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// phung po dang / khams dang / 
126b7(khri brgyad): skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// 
126b8(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi bar dag la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro ba yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i
127a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi
127a2(khri brgyad): 'byung lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob
127a3(khri brgyad): pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
127a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das
127a5(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags nas/ 
127a6(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen par byed/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul
127a7(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags nas mngon par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa
127a8(khri brgyad): shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bor dag la brtags nas mngon pa zhen par byed de/ shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
127b1(khri brgyad): chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar
127b2(khri brgyad): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma lags
127b3(khri brgyad): mod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / 
127b4(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha
127b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags shing / ji ltar bslabs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'a byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
127b6(khri brgyad): pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs yang dag par rjes
127b7(khri brgyad): mi mthong na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
127b8(khri brgyad): nyid du nges par 'byung // de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu/ 
128a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs yang dag par rje su mi mthong na/ byang chub kyi bar dag mi dmigs/ 
128a2(khri brgyad): yang dag par rje su mi mthong / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang mi dmigs yang dag par rje su mi mthong
128a3(khri brgyad): na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin to// ma dmigs pa'i
128a4(khri brgyad): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung // shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ba lags/ 
128a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid mi da migs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung // de nas bcom
128a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri ste/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
128a7(khri brgyad): bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de
128a8(khri brgyad): skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/ de bzhin du ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // brtson 'grus kyi pha rorab tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
128b1(khri brgyad): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad
128b2(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dang / rnam
128b3(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la bslab nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
128b4(khri brgyad): ra shes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri de la ji skad bstan por bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de khyod zhing la dris// khyod kyis
128b5(khri brgyad): ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob shig/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin skam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ 
128b6(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom
128b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la mig kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus
128b8(khri brgyad): yid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyum yang gzhan la gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan
129a1(khri brgyad): zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / 
129a2(khri brgyad): sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la mig
129a3(khri brgyad): gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan zhig yin skam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te
129a4(khri brgyad): reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis
129a5(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang
129a6(khri brgyad): ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan larna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
129a7(khri brgyad): dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am
129a8(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
129b1(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gso
129b2(khri brgyad): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam
129b3(khri brgyad): 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la smon pa med pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa
129b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gan
129b5(khri brgyad): zhig yin snya ma 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la sangs rgya sa kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
129b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gnan zhig yin skam
129b7(khri brgyad): 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma legs te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs
129b8(khri brgyad): nyid kyang sgyu mi lags la sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
130a1(khri brgyad): yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lag so// sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma
130a2(khri brgyad): yang gzhan ma lags/ mig kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan
130a3(khri brgyad): ma lags/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid nyid kyang sgyu ma lags/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid lags// bcom ldan
130a4(khri brgyad): 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs lag so// / 
130a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan ma la gas te/ bcom ldan 'das chos rnams nyid kyang sgyu
130a6(khri brgyad): ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos rnams lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig
130a7(khri brgyad): gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig rnam par shes pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / 
130a8(khri brgyad): sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / spyi'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam pa
130b1(khri brgyad): shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lag
130b2(khri brgyad): te/ bcom ldan 'das mig 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig 'dus te reg pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags la/ rna 'i
130b3(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
130b4(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma srid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig 'dus te reg
130b5(khri brgyad): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am// sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'dra
130b6(khri brgyad): migi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
130b7(khri brgyad): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan
130b8(khri brgyad): ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
130b9(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang mi lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa yang gzhan me lags te// bcom
131a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba pa sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags bzhid kyang sgyum
131a2(khri brgyad): lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsnga ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa lagasas
131a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos subacu
131a4(khri brgyad): rtsa bdun nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub sa kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan mo lags/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
131a5(khri brgyad): ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma la/ gas la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid lag so// ba com ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mtshan
131a6(khri brgyad): ma ma mchis pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma mi mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtshan mi ma mchis pa lag so// bcom
131a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das smon pa ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid
131a8(khri brgyad): kyang smon pa ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
131b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags
131b2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma
131b3(khri brgyad): nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom
131b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma la dgas la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid log so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
131b5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
131b6(khri brgyad): ma mchis lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
131b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas
131b8(khri brgyad): nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba
132a1(khri brgyad): 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur sngam 'am/ rab byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan las de ni ma lags
132a2(khri brgyad): so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las le'u dgu pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa// bam po brgyad pa/ 
132a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar ming dang
132a4(khri brgyad): brdas tha snyad du gdag su yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis ga sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom daldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam
132a5(khri brgyad): du sems/ ming dang brdas tha snyad gdags pa tsam gyi sa nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag gi skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par
132a6(khri brgyad): byang ba dag dmig su yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ 
132a7(khri brgyad): gong la ming dang mtshan ma med pa dang / brda med pa dang / gdags pa med pa tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus/ 
132a8(khri brgyad): kyi lam med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
