132b1(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam
132b2(khri brgyad): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
132b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslabs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
132b4(khri brgyad): nyid du ngos por 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
132b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la de ltar slob cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal bas
132b6(khri brgyad): na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslabs pa ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslabs par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po
132b7(khri brgyad): gang dag lags pa de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag
132b8(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
133a1(khri brgyad): skam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ba lagaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po dag ni dos
133a2(khri brgyad): po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmig su ma mchis pa'i smad du'o// bcom
133a3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs pa'i rnam pa thams
133a4(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'byung lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
133a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang zhin legs la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigasu ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// / 
133a6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ drug cha lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag dang / mig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / 
133a7(khri brgyad): smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges
133a8(khri brgyad): par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar brag cha ni dngos po
133b1(khri brgyad): kho ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ mig yor yang dngos po mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ chu zla yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sgyu ma yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ smig
133b2(khri brgyad): rgyu yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sprul pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ gzugs brnyan yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma
133b3(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigasu ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed
133b4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu lags te/ rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de ni dbang po drug lags shing / de dag ni phung po lnga po dag lags la/ de dag ni nang spong
133b5(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyis dmigasu ma mchis shing / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo ni da stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis dmi gsum mchis pa 'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
133b6(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos nas skrag te
133b7(khri brgyad): dang zhing dngang bar mi lcags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du yang dag
133b8(khri brgyad): par zhugs pa yang yin la/ thabs la yang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis lag tu yang masong na/ skrag cing dngang la dang bar yang 'gyuraro// rab khyo
134a1(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi
134a2(khri brgyad): dang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
134a3(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la mo rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste
134a4(khri brgyad): de yang mi dmig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan po'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
134a5(khri brgyad): shes pa la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
134a6(khri brgyad): la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni rnam pa tham
134a7(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bo dag gis gzugs la sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam
134a8(khri brgyad): ba dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang // smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste de la yang mi
134b1(khri brgyad): dmig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sdug
134b2(khri brgyad): bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / 
134b3(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
134b4(khri brgyad): tho shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
134b5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i yid la bya ba dang / gos gzugs la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor
134b6(khri brgyad): rtog ste de la yang mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa
134b7(khri brgyad): shes pa la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
134b8(khri brgyad): spyod pa'i thabs la mkhos pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po ni/ rnam
135a1(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ gzugs la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmig so/ 
135a2(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigaso// rab 'byor gzhan
135a3(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog
135a4(khri brgyad): ste/ de yang mi dmig so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang
135a5(khri brgyad): mi dmig so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis
135a6(khri brgyad): gzugs la zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog s+ho/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bya bor so sor rtog
135a7(khri brgyad): ste/ de yang mi dmigaso// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
135a8(khri brgyad): panyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byab so// gzugs la stong zhes bya ba ngas sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmig so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa
135b1(khri brgyad): shes pa stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmig so// gzugs la mtshan ma med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
135b2(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mtshan ma med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmig so// gzugs la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de
135b3(khri brgyad): yang mi dmig so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmig so// gzugs la
135b4(khri brgyad): 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba chu la byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya
135b5(khri brgyad): bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmig so// gzugs la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmig so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dra
135b6(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigaso// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
135b7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de ltar so sor rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems te/ 
135b8(khri brgyad): bdag gis sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
136a1(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam tha shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// gzugs sdug bsngal
136a2(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / ni zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
136a3(khri brgyad): ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigaso pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa pa shes pa
136a4(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan mu med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba
136a5(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du bya ba me ces bya ba dang / ston nas chos bston pa dun s+t+wa~M/ de yong mi dmigs 'i tshul gyis bya'o snyam dumam so// rab 'byor
136a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi
136a7(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ gzugs
136a8(khri brgyad): mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed do// de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bye ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 
136b1(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
136b2(khri brgyad): ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rnam par shes pa'i bar du
136b3(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zho zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes
136b4(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma mod ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs mngon por 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya
136b5(khri brgyad): bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du bye/ de rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces
136b6(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces
136b7(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar yid la byed do// de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// 
136b8(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa ste/ ngos na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
137a1(khri brgyad): mi skrag mi dngang zhing dang bar mi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skye
137a2(khri brgyad): ban/ chos gang dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / 'dog med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa da // mtshan
137a3(khri brgyad): ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog cing / bzod pa la 'dod pa
137a4(khri brgyad): de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag
137a5(khri brgyad): mi dang zhing dang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ 
137a6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i yong la bya ba dag gis/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar so so dog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// gzugs
137a7(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / 
137a8(khri brgyad): gzugs smon pa maud ces bya ba dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
137b1(khri brgyad): byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes byu ga
137b2(khri brgyad): dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba so sor rtog cing / 
137b3(khri brgyad): yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed// de'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams mi gautong zhing / brtson pa mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni/ 
137b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang ba
137b5(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' so/ mas dpa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ na pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sa
137b6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang / de las gzhan pa mi dge ba'i chos gang byang chub kyi bar du gcod par byed pa dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
137b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa
137b8(khri brgyad): ni mi skrag mi dang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po ni/ 'di ltar so sor rtog/ 
138a1(khri brgyad): ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang
138a2(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi stong pa nyid
138a3(khri brgyad): kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig go/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma
138a4(khri brgyad): yin gyi/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yi da // gzugs nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis kyi/ zugs stong pa ma yin gyi gzugs nyid kyang stong pazhi/ 
138a5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyang gzugaso// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang // chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin gyi// chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos
138a6(khri brgyad): rnam so// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi rnam par shes pa skyong ba ma yin gyi/ migi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig rnam
138a7(khri brgyad): par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes kyi stso
138a8(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong panyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam pa shes pa'o// mig 'dus tig/ 
138b1(khri brgyad): pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang // sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / 
138b2(khri brgyad): lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid
138b3(khri brgyad): kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
138b4(khri brgyad): stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshe/ darab nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna
138b5(khri brgyad): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus
138b6(khri brgyad): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'das/ 
138b7(khri brgyad): rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid // stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dru ci/ 
138b8(khri brgyad): bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams// yang dag par spong
139a1(khri brgyad): / rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam gyi stong pa nyid kyis lam stong
139a2(khri brgyad): ba ma yin gyi/ lam nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lam mo// stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 
139a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems
139a4(khri brgyad): dpa sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems pa pa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
139a5(khri brgyad): nga'i thabs la mkhas pa yin te/ thabs de dang ldan na/ nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dang zhing dngang bar mi
139a6(khri brgyad): 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag gis yongasu zin na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na mi
139a7(khri brgyad): skrag mi dang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
139a8(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag ni gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa
139b1(khri brgyad): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du
139b2(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam
139b3(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
139b4(khri brgyad): po'i dge ba'i ba shes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor ba/ zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang de la go zugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba bston/ 
139b5(khri brgyad): bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang
139b6(khri brgyad): dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
139b7(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston/ bdag med
139b8(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces byi ba dang / smon pa maud ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bo dang / dben zhes bya ba
140a1(khri brgyad): ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
140a2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
140a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes
140a4(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi
140a5(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa ra nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
140a6(khri brgyad): yongasu mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba ston// sdug bsngal zhes bye ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong
140a7(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi di ma gros pa'i tshul
140a8(khri brgyad): gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa ro// nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sa sa rgyas kyi sar yong su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor/ 
140b1(khri brgyad): de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
140b2(khri brgyad): bshes gnyen gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med
140b3(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon por 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de
140b4(khri brgyad): dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya
140b5(khri brgyad): chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bang / med ces bya ba dang / ni zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon po me
140b6(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad
140b7(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi so 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i
140b8(khri brgyad): bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la/ mig rnam par shes pa dang / 
141a1(khri brgyad): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes
141a2(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / mtshan ma med bya dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang
141a3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus
141a4(khri brgyad): te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / de bzhin du sna dang / lho dang lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus
141a5(khri brgyad): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma
141a6(khri brgyad): med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar snyan te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
141a7(khri brgyad): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
141a8(khri brgyad): gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bo shes gnyen ni gang dag de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi
141b1(khri brgyad): rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
141b2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams mi
141b3(khri brgyad): rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa la
141b4(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su mi bsngo ba dang / de bani na du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag/ par rig pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
141b5(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston/ te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cidage ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
141b6(khri brgyad): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
141b7(khri brgyad): rnams te/ de dag gis yong su zin pa ni/ bskrun pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dang shing dang bar mi 'gyur// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
141b8(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis shing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu
142a1(khri brgyad): spangs nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
142a2(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas
142a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom ning dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sem su byed pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu byon pa dang / brtson
142a4(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi na pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgoma'ang dmigs te/ 
142a5(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom semasu byed pa dang / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dang / 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
142a6(khri brgyad): le spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral bas gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
142a7(khri brgyad): byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar du yod la byed/ cher 'dod 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams
142a8(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed/ rnam par shes pa pi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 
142b1(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / nang stong pa nyid de yang mi dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang mi dmigs/ phyi nang stong
142b2(khri brgyad): pa nyid de yang mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang mi dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sem su byed pa dang / mig nang stong bgis bya
142b3(khri brgyad): yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byedamig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
142b4(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de/ dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom semasu byed pa dang / rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid
142b5(khri brgyad): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes pa bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya// bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
142b6(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / sdong po gang de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlo ma semasu byeng ba dang / de bzhin du gzugs dang / 
142b7(khri brgyad): dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos rnams la yang bya'o// de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / migi 'dus
142b8(khri brgyad): te reg pa dang / rna 'dong sna dang lce dang lus dang / yod kyi 'dus te rig pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyi
143a1(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 
143a2(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom semasu byed pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar
143a3(khri brgyad): ma rig pa dang / rga shi'i bar du nang stong pa zhes bya bar mid la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa ngo bo nyid stong
143a4(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems byed pa dang / rab 'byor gzhan yang
143a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral
143a6(khri brgyad): bas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed pa dang / de bzhin du
143a7(khri brgyad): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lcag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
143a8(khri brgyad): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang
143b1(khri brgyad): sgom zhing / de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
143b2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dang zhing dngang bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
143b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis te/ sdig pa'i grogs po des yongasu zin pas/ shes rab kyi pha
143b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dngang zhing dngang ba ra 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
143b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni gang 'di skad du/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang / dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma
143b6(khri brgyad): yin gyis 'di la bslab par mi bya'o// 'di dag ni snyan dgas mkhan gyis rang bzo yin pas/ 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o// gzung bar mi bya'o// kun chub par mi bya
143b7(khri brgyad): bcang bar mi bya'o// bklag paro mi bya'o// sgom par mi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o// gzhan dag la yang bstan par mi bya'o zhes/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
143b8(khri brgyad): dang bral bar byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
144a1(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar byed pa ste/ rab khyor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// 
144a2(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ 'di ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bskur cing / byang chub sems dpa'
144a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i drung 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas/ khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod
144a4(khri brgyad): la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod / ra ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la
144a5(khri brgyad): ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyen la ci zhig bya zhes zer zhing 'bral bar byed do// de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston cing / bdud kyi nyes
144a6(khri brgyad): pa dag mi brjod pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
144a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs pa ni/ 'di ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
144a8(khri brgyad): drung du 'ongs nas/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dang / byangs kyis bskrad pa'i sde dang / lung bstan pa'i sde dang / de lta bu thung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang / glang
144b1(khri brgyad): gzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dag ston par byed/ rab tu ston par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ gsal bar byed/ yang dag par rab tu ston par byed cing / bdud
144b2(khri brgyad): kyi las 'di lta bu de dag skyed par 'gyur ro zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i
144b3(khri brgyad): grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing
144b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang me'o// khyod ni phyir mi
144b5(khri brgyad): ldog pa yang ma yin no// khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dang / par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa ra 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus zer ro zhes bdud kyi
144b6(khri brgyad): las de lta bu de dag de la mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
144b7(khri brgyad): gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag dang bdag
144b8(khri brgyad): gis stong ngo // rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos rnams ni
145a1(khri brgyad): bdag dang bdag gis spong ngo // rig gi u pa shes pa ni bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rtswa'i rnam par shes pa dang / skye
145a2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // 
145a3(khri brgyad): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // 
145a4(khri brgyad): mig 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i
145a5(khri brgyad): 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus teg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te/ rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gi sa
145a6(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
145a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stongo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis sto // yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / 
145a8(khri brgyad): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni 'dag/ 
145b1(khri brgyad): dang bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas ci zhig bya zhes ze ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi stos
145b2(khri brgyad): pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can// sangs rgyas
145b3(khri brgyad): kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / 
145b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis sto/ ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sem/ sa dpa' yang med/ nyan thos kyang med do// de bzhi
145b5(khri brgyad): du phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam sa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas
145b6(khri brgyad): kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ nyan thos kyang med do zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa
145b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can thos kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
145b8(khri brgyad): drung du 'ongs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag bzlog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ljon pa'i yid la byed pa dag la 'doms te
146a1(khri brgyad): rjesu ston par byed nas bdud kyi las de lta bu dag mi brjod pa ston pa gang yin pade dag ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenardo
146a2(khri brgyad): sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi cha byad du bsgyur tsong / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
146a3(khri brgyad): drung du 'ongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang bral bar byed la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bar byed cing / dran pa nye bar
146a4(khri brgyad): gzhag pa rnams la sbyor bar byed/ 'phags pa'i/ lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag la yang sbyor bar byed/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
146a5(khri brgyad): smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la yang sbyor bar byed/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos 'di dag bsgoms la/ nyan thos kyis mngon sum
146a6(khri brgyad): du gyis shig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis ci zhig bya zhes zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ 
146a7(khri brgyad): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can pa dang ma'i cha byad du bsgyur cing
146a8(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu gang gi don du skal ba tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba ni 'khor zhing
146b1(khri brgyad): lag pa bcad pa dang / rkang pa bcad pa dang / mgo bcad pa dpag tu med pa dag nyaMsu myong bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
146b2(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig/ gang
146b3(khri brgyad): la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod pa de la 'dzin par gyis shig ces zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa
146b4(khri brgyad): drini/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge slong
146b5(khri brgyad): gi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ mi gau mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston/ 
146b6(khri brgyad): de bzhin du mig sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / sman pa med ces bya
146b7(khri brgyad): ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang // lus dang / yid mi rtag
146b8(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med
147a1(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang // mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag
147a2(khri brgyad): pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon
147a3(khri brgyad): ba med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / yang dag por spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po
147a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi na lag rnams dang / lam mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya
147a5(khri brgyad): ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa maud ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba da
147a6(khri brgyad): dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med
147a7(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshon ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / 
147a8(khri brgyad): dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po
147b1(khri brgyad): sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rigs nas kyang yongasu spang bar bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las sgyu ma lta bu'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu
147b2(khri brgyad): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
147b3(khri brgyad): po zhes bgyi ba'i gzhi'i don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor lo 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor
147b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub kyang skye ba med/ sems dpa' yang skye ba med de/ rab
147b5(khri brgyad): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' la skye ba dang / yod pa nyid med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byorabyang chub la yang gzhi med/ sems dpa' la yang
147b6(khri brgyad): bzhi med/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya'i rje su med cing mi dmig so// 
147b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmagoso// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam la gzhi med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor
147b8(khri brgyad): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma la gzhi med cing mi dmig so// smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / brag
148a1(khri brgyad): cha dang / mig yod dang / gzugs brnyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa la gzhi med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
148a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigaso// rab 'byor 'di lta ste de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi
148a3(khri brgyad): don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmig so// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos
148a4(khri brgyad): kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med/ nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhi med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sem
148a5(khri brgyad): dpe gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor / de lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
148a6(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
148a7(khri brgyad): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu la mig gi gzhi med cing mi dmig so// rna ba dang sna dang lce
148a8(khri brgyad): dang lus dang / yid kyi gni med cing mi dmig so// gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos kyi gni ming cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
148b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes
148b2(khri brgyad): bu'i mig rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmig so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes
148b3(khri brgyad): pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
148b4(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmi gso// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang medo
148b5(khri brgyad): cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro/ la tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
148b6(khri brgyad): gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ba ro la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs
148b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmag so// 8
148b8(khri brgyad): 'byo bo de lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dran pa zhi bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i gno don kyang mid cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu
149a1(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
149a2(khri brgyad): brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
149a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi don kyang med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dbor na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas la
149a4(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byo/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byung
149a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin ga/ gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
149a6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigaso// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
149a7(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag
149a8(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lo mig gi gzhi mdo// rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyi gni mod do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa
149b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
149b2(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nang stong pa nyid kyi gzhi med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
149b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
149b4(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran pazhi par gnag pa rnams kyi gzhi med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
149b5(khri brgyad): bar dag gi gzhi medo// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
149b6(khri brgyad): dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams la 'dus pas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do// 'dus byas kyi khams la yang 'dus ma byas kyi
149b7(khri brgyad): khams kyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don re // 
149b8(khri brgyad): ra rkyor 'dis skyed pa pag / skye ba med pa lo gni ming ngo do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems da' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa bya
150a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmig
150a2(khri brgyad): su med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
150a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa la gang gi gzhi ma mchis pa lag/ 
150a4(khri brgyad): kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchos pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i ba rol gang gi gzhi ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor skyes
150a5(khri brgyad): med pa la gzugs kyi gni med do// skye ba med pa la tshor ba/ dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa shes pa'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor kun nas nyon
150a6(khri brgyad): mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la gzugs kyi gzhi med do// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la tshor ba dang 'du shes
150a7(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med de// de bzhin du skye ba med pa la khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams kyi gzhi medo// kun nas nyon mongs pa med
150a8(khri brgyad): pa dang / rnam par byed ba med po'i bar la khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi gan med de// skye ba med pa la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum su rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'dzi/ 
150b1(khri brgyad): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi gni med do// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ba
150b2(khri brgyad): brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i
150b3(khri brgyad): don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs
150b4(khri brgyad): su med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'a byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
150b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bya nga chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du
150b6(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa lo skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar gyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
150b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs shin
150b8(khri brgyad): tu rnam par dag pa la/ mtshan ma'i gni med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang
151a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i dis ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin
151a2(khri brgyad): tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
151a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// de bzhin du/ khams dang // skye mched // na cing brel bar 'thung ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan mi zhini med// so
151a4(khri brgyad): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa na tho shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byong
151a5(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshon ma'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
151a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don medo// byor 'di lta ste dper na/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul
151a7(khri brgyad): kyi rkang padu / dang bro dang / stos dang / byang chub kyi yon lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi gas pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang
151a8(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ba ro dog shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi'i don mdo// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
151b1(khri brgyad): bo gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir/ bdag shin tu rnam
151b2(khri brgyad): bar dag pa la gzhi medo// shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/ shes pa po dang // mthong ba po'i bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do// ra
151b3(khri brgyad): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don medo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i
151b4(khri brgyad): dkyil 'khor shar ba na mun pa'i gzhi med do// ba 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sem ngas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
151b5(khri brgyad): nga'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bsreg pa'i skal pa la 'du byed thams cad kyi gzhi med do// rab
151b6(khri brgyad): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
151b7(khri brgyad): dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la 'tshal pa'i tshul khrims kyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du
151b8(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin/ 
152a1(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnam par g.yeng ba'i gzhi med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab la 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi gzhi me do// de bzhin
152a2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba la rnam par grol ba'i gzhi med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong
152a3(khri brgyad): ba ma yin pa'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi
152a4(khri brgyad): med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dang zla bar 'od la mun pa'i gzhi medo// rab 'byor de bzhi ngan du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
152a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che/ 
152a6(khri brgyad): dang / glog gi 'od la gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
152a7(khri brgyad): gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / 'thab bral gyi lha rnams dang / dga'
152a8(khri brgyad): ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od
152b1(khri brgyad): la gzhi med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar gyi 'od la gzhi mdo// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
152b2(khri brgyad): ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / byang chub
152b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i gzhi'i don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ spyong ba med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa dang / 
152b4(khri brgyad): 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid med pa nyi
152b5(khri brgyad): la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa
152b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ma mchis pa nyid la ni ji ltar bslab par bgyi
152b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar khong du chud par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad
152b8(khri brgyad): ces bya ba ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung bstan du yod pa dang / lung du ma bsten pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa
153a1(khri brgyad): hA/ dag pa myed pa dang / las byas dang / 'dus rgyas dang // kha nam tho ba dang bcas pa dang / khan mtho ba med pa dang / thun mo dang / thun mos
153a2(khri brgyad): yin pa dag go// rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag ni med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// byang chub sem
153a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba yang de dag yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khro brgyad stong pa/ 
153a4(khri brgyad): bam po dgu pa// rab 'byor gyis gsol bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal / 
153a5(khri brgyad): 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni 'dzin pa dang / mang 'dzin pa dang / dge / dadu 'dzin pa 'am/ bram zer 'dzin pa 'am/ rigs kyi
153a6(khri brgyad): gtso bo la rim gror byed pa dang / sbyin pa las thung ba'i gsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i ngos
153a7(khri brgyad): po dang / zhal tu byed pa dang ldan pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i rnam par bam po'i 'du shes dang / rnam par rnag
153a8(khri brgyad): pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzigs pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes de
153b1(khri brgyad): rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus gong gi 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bani dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
153b2(khri brgyad): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'jig rten pa'i sangs rgyas rje su dran pa dang / chos rje su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rje su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rje su dran pa dang / 
153b3(khri brgyad): gtong ba rjesu dran pa dang / lha rje su dran pa dang / dbugs 'byung ba rjesu dran pa dang / rngub pa rjesu dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjesu dran pa dang / lus su gtogs pa rjesu dran pa dang / 
153b4(khri brgyad): skyob rjesu dran pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa
153b5(khri brgyad): chos mi dge ba rnams gang logs/ bcom ldan 'ad/ sa kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa 'i chos mi dge ba ni srog gcod pa dang / ma byon par len
153b6(khri brgyad): pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig khyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / 
153b7(khri brgyad): log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal te/ rab
153b8(khri brgyad): 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams shes pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ 
154a1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// ngag gi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan
154a2(khri brgyad): pa'o// 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// dbang po lnga ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// skye mched drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms
154a3(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// phung po drang / khams dang / skye mched drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// rnam par sbyin pa ni lung du ma bstan pa ste/ 
154a4(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das la jig rten pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan
154a5(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang
154a6(khri brgyad): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa 'on dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa
154a7(khri brgyad): dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams ma gtogs par/ 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji srid pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol
154a8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las das pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka'aphrul pa/ 'jig rtenams 'das po'i tsho rna mos zhes bya ba ni/ 
154b1(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang // yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
154b2(khri brgyad): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon
154b3(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / mi shes pa kun shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa
154b4(khri brgyad): dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing pyod pa med pa'i ting 'dzin dang / mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / 
154b5(khri brgyad): dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin du yo la byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la
154b6(khri brgyad): lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dnga'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// sdug pa nyid du mos pa
154b7(khri brgyad): 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur
154b8(khri brgyad): cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas ni/ na mkha' mtha' yaso snyam nas/ namakha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te/ gnas pa 'di ni rnam par
155a1(khri brgyad): ba bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yaso snyam nas/ 
155a2(khri brgyad): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te/ gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das
155a3(khri brgyad): ci yang med pa'i skye mchod bsgrubs te/ gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad dri ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du
155a4(khri brgyad): shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te/ nus pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o//  ma pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med
155a5(khri brgyad): min skye mched la yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te/ gnas pa 'di ni rna ma par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar
155a6(khri brgyad): pa brgya do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang
155a7(khri brgyad): bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing
155a8(khri brgyad): nang yong su dong ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa'i ting 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bas mo gtan gnyis pa sdu
155b1(khri brgyad): te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang / shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags
155b2(khri brgyad): ba rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang / dran pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas
155b3(khri brgyad): pa dang / de bde ba yang spangs/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang
155b4(khri brgyad): ma yin pa btang snyoms dang / dran pa yongasu dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te/ gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams
155b5(khri brgyad): las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ na mkha'
155b6(khri brgyad): mtha' yaso snyam nas/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te/ gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag
155b7(khri brgyad): par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' ya so snyag rnam shes mtha' yas skye meched bsgrubs te/ gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas
155b8(khri brgyad): skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang mdo snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched
156a1(khri brgyad): las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du
156a2(khri brgyad): shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs pa ste/ de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
156a3(khri brgyad): dgu'o// nang stong pa nyid nas dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
156a4(khri brgyad): bar rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams te/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'ongs pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la zag pa
156a5(khri brgyad): dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phreng / po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / kham sa bco brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / chad
156a6(khri brgyad): med pa pani dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams
156a7(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spang ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan las
156a8(khri brgyad): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres/ 
156b1(khri brgyad): ba bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi kham
156b2(khri brgyad): dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan gang dag 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
156b3(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang yin te/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams shes bya'o// de la 'dus mi byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ chos gang dag la skye ba dang / 
156b4(khri brgyad): 'jig pa dang / gzhan du 'gyur bar mi snang ba dag ste/ dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gita mug zad pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / mo nor ba
156b5(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid dang / gzhin ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos ga/ nus pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang
156b6(khri brgyad): dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes bya'o// de la thun mong gi chos rnams gang zhe na/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
156b7(khri brgyad): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang // mngon par shes pa lnga ste/ de dag ni thun mong gi chos rnams shes bya'o// de la thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams gang nin
156b8(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / 
157a1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
157a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa dang / dpyod pa med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams dang / 
157a3(khri brgyad): chags pa med pa dang / yod pa ma yin par bslab par bya'o// chos thams cad gnyi su med pa'i tshul du khong du chud par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
157a4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan// 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ pau zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'
157a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po dang // sems can gyi ris phal po che'i
157a6(khri brgyad): phul du byed par 'gyur bas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
157a7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi phul du bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi tshogs chen po ni gang lags/ sems can gyi ris phal po che ni gang lags/ bcom
157a8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi tshogs chen po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir
157b1(khri brgyad): 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i
157b2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag go/ rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che zhes bya ste byang chub sems
157b3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de'i phul du byed par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi cho ga
157b4(khri brgyad): chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ 
157b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'di ltar bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu
157b6(khri brgyad): med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go che bgo bar bya'o// bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtang bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad
157b7(khri brgyad): la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yong su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can thams cad yongasu
157b8(khri brgyad): mya ngan las bzlas kyang sems can gang yang yongasu mya ngan las bzlas pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag po med pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o// 
158a1(khri brgyad): bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams
158a2(khri brgyad): cad kyi rjesu song ba'i chos rtogs pas yong su grub pa la bslabs par bya'o// chos rnams tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o// bdag gis chos dpag tu
158a3(khri brgyad): med pa'i bar dag sgrub pas rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems
158a4(khri brgyad): bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du byed
158a5(khri brgyad): par 'gyur te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis te// da do// rab byor gzhan yang byang chub sem// sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'di ltar bskyed
158a6(khri brgyad): sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dong / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar gyur pa de dag gi don du
158a7(khri brgyad): bdag gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de nyam su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par
158a8(khri brgyad): bya ste/ bdag gis sems can de dag phung po'i lhag mo med pa'i mya ngan la so 'das pa'i dbying su mya ngan las 'das par ma gyur gyi bar du/ sems can gcig gi don du
158b1(khri brgyad): yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum mang por sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag gis nyam su myong bar bya'o zhes thabs de lta bus/ sems can de dag
158b2(khri brgyad): phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las bzlas par ma gyur gyi bar du sems can thams cad kyi ched du bdag gis sems can
158b3(khri brgyad): dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de nyam su myong bar bya'o// phyis gdod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du byang chub kyi
158b4(khri brgyad): tshogs bsags la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byo'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rab 'byor de n-i byang chub
158b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed ba rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
158b6(khri brgyad): gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du byed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sem
158b7(khri brgyad): can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba'i sems rlabs po che rtag par rgyun tu bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po
158b8(khri brgyad): tshe nigs sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyod/ zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/ gti mug gi sems mi bskyed/ rnam par
159a1(khri brgyad): 'tshe ba'i sems mi bskyed/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi bskyed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
159a2(khri brgyad): chen po'i sems rlabs po che yin te/ des sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed cing / des rlom semasu yang mi byed// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
159a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos mi skul bar semasu bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi bskul ba ni 'di yin te/ gang rnam pa thams cad
159a4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rlom sems mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi bskul ba'o// 
159a5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa'i chen pos sems can thams cad la pa na pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// 
159a6(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i sems ni 'di yin te/ gang sems can thams cad skyob cing / sems can thams cad yongasu
159a7(khri brgyad): mi gtong la des rlom sems yang mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i semaso// rab 'byor byang chub
159a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar spyod pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de yang mi dmigs
159b1(khri brgyad): ba'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par rgyun du chos 'dod par bya'o// chos la dga' bar bya'o// chos la kun
159b2(khri brgyad): tu dga' bar bya'o// chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o// de la chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa'o// de la chos 'dod pa
159b3(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ gang chos la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ de ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ de ni chos
