159b4(khri brgyad): la dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la kun tu dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang tshos la yon tan dang phan yon du lta ba ste/ de ni chos la kun tu dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la
159b5(khri brgyad): kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de/ nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ da ni chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes
159b6(khri brgyad): bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris pal
159b7(khri brgyad): po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
159b8(khri brgyad): la spyod pas nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul
160a1(khri brgyad): du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
160a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
160a3(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmig
160a4(khri brgyad): ba'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin la gnas/ 
160a5(khri brgyad): nam mkha' ltar tshogs pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos ba med pa'i ting 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can
160a6(khri brgyad): gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
160a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de'i
160a8(khri brgyad): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las khrel yod pa zhes bya ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// 
160b1(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la
160b2(khri brgyad): bdag kyang spobs lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la khyod spobs par gyis
160b3(khri brgyad): shig/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du lto ba dang / srog tu lta
160b4(khri brgyad): ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / slob pa dang / kun nas
160b5(khri brgyad): slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed du 'jug pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod
160b6(khri brgyad): par lta ba dang / med par lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang / khom su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba dang / dben par lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lta ba dang / 
160b7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi cho su lta ba dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba dang / sems
160b8(khri brgyad): can yong su smin par bgyi bar lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par bgyi bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyasu lta ba dang / cho su lta ba dang / dge 'dun
161a1(khri brgyad): du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang / yo su mya ngan las 'das par lta ba dang / spang ba'i slad du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
161a2(khri brgyad): sems can rnams la chos ston te/ don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la
161a3(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugasu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
161a4(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang
161a5(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems byedapa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la dmigs
161a6(khri brgyad): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed de/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul
161a7(khri brgyad): gyis lta ba bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir/ byang chub
161a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugasu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
161b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas lta ba de dag spang ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'ad/ 
161b2(khri brgyad): la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang
161b3(khri brgyad): spobs pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod spobs par gyis shig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
161b4(khri brgyad): kyi sems zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam pa med ba'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i/ nya na thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma
161b5(khri brgyad): lags pa'i sems gang lags pa'i sems de la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// 
161b6(khri brgyad): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongasu gtogs pa ma legs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems
161b7(khri brgyad): zag pa ma mi ches shing khongasu gtogs pa ma logs pa'i sems de la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi
161b8(khri brgyad): ba'i grong su mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
162a1(khri brgyad): chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems de gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis
162a2(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang la yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa yang dang / 
162a3(khri brgyad): par rje su mi mthong / 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa
162a4(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu gang skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'grib pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
162a5(khri brgyad): ba med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan tho sa kyi sems med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sem sa med/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems med/ yang
162a6(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam
162a7(khri brgyad): ba ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i semaso// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad
162a8(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med par khongasu gtogs pa ma yin pa gang yin pa'i sems de la yang chags pa med ces smras no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs
162b1(khri brgyad): kyang chags pa med pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 
162b2(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// / 
162b3(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar
162b4(khri brgyad): du yang chags pa medo// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gang yin pa de yang chags
162b5(khri brgyad): pa med cing khongasu gtogs pa ma yin zhes smra na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rna mas kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir
162b6(khri brgyad): zag pa med cing khongasu gtogs pa ma yin pa yin na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong
162b7(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khong su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA rI'i bu de de bzhin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang
162b8(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag po med cing khongasu gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams
163a1(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras
163a2(khri brgyad): pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig
163a3(khri brgyad): ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa gni dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khosu
163a4(khri brgyad): gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi
163a5(khri brgyad): sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khong su gtogs pa ma yin na// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems dang / 
163a6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu gtogs pa ma yin no// gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis
163a7(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu gtogs pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu gtogs pa
163a8(khri brgyad): ma yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyis chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
163a9(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ber dog kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// shA ri'i dus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ra
163b1(khri brgyad): 'byor khyod kyis gang 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir sems de la yang chags pa med ces smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs med pa yang gzugs
163b2(khri brgyad): la chags pa med dam/ tshor ba med pa yang tshor ba la chags pa med dam/ 'du shes med pa yang 'du shes la chags pa med dam/ 'du byed rnams med pa yang 'du byed
163b3(khri brgyad): rnams la chags pa med dam/ rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// 
163b4(khri brgyad): ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med pa yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
163b5(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi tshe sa ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin
163b6(khri brgyad): no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam
163b7(khri brgyad): par shes pa la chags pa med do// khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 
163b8(khri brgyad): stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa rnams la chags pa med/ 
164a1(khri brgyad): shA li 'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ 
164a2(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mongs ma yin pa'i sems des kyang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom semasu 'gyur ba med/ mngon par zhen
164a3(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ba med de/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las lta ba spang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu
164a4(khri brgyad): gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub
164a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spro bas lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ gang po khyod spobs par gyis shig/ gang
164a6(khri brgyad): pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags/ sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags/ sems can de ni theg pa
164a7(khri brgyad): chen po la yang dag par gnas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ 
164a8(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes
164b1(khri brgyad): gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa ma yin/ sbyin
164b2(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sbyin pa byin pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin par byed// nyi tshe'i sems
164b3(khri brgyad): can rnams kyi cheng du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te tshul khrims bsrung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
164b4(khri brgyad): la spyod cing tshul khrims bsru // nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bzod pa bsgom pa ni ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi
164b5(khri brgyad): ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bzod pa sgom par byed do// nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du brtsen 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ brtson
164b6(khri brgyad): 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus rlom mo// nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bas
164b7(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan
164b8(khri brgyad): rnams skyed do// nyi tsho'i sems can rnams kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du shes rab
165a1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab sgom par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni phung po'i lhag sa
165a2(khri brgyad): med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o// zhes 'am/ sems can 'di snyed
165a3(khri brgyad): cig ni byang chub la dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di skad cig ni byang chub la dgod par mi bya'o// sems can yong su dngage pa rog tshwa mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa
165a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi ched du/ tsho gyon no// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bag/ gos kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs
165a5(khri brgyad): par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i blo rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
165a6(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 
165a7(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar byo'o sgo mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin
165a8(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mi/ 
165b1(khri brgyad): la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo brjen/ 
165b2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
165b3(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin
165b4(khri brgyad): zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su mi bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che nu po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa sbyin pa
165b5(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad
165b6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
165b7(khri brgyad): spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri ri bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams
165b8(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus ma btang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin
166a1(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di lta ste/ 
166a2(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed pa gang yin pa
166a3(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga
166a4(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa ste na zhing de gi tsog pu la dmigs pa'i phyir chos tha mas cad la sgyums byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas
166a5(khri brgyad): shing / sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa yang mi dmigs// len pa po yang mi dmigs pa de ni byang chub sem rdzas dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
166a6(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa sbyin pa sbyin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad
166a7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mi dmigs pa ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
166a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa go ma chen po 'gos par rig par bya ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
166b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cing dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin pa de yang sems can
166b2(khri brgyad): thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha
166b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems depe sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
166b4(khri brgyad): la spyod pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi so la yang 'dod pa med na/ so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
166b5(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrim sa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
166b6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa gang yin
166b7(khri brgyad): bde ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang dang
166b8(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bya ba dag gis/ brtson 'grus mi mnyam mi 'gong
167a1(khri brgyad): pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
167a2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa
167a3(khri brgyad): yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed cing / sems bskyed pa de yang sems can thams cad dang
167a4(khri brgyad): thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
167a5(khri brgyad): byin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri ri bu gzhan yang byang chub sa/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi
167a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ rang bzhin
167a7(khri brgyad): gyis stong pa nyid kyi tshul khrims des rlom semasu yang mi byed la mi dmigs pa de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi
167a8(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol
167b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa
167b2(khri brgyad): drug po thams cad yongasu 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu
167b3(khri brgyad): byin pa la spyod pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis
167b4(khri brgyad): sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba
167b5(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pa rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
167b6(khri brgyad): la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA rol du
167b7(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi
167b8(khri brgyad): shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad
168a1(khri brgyad): yong su smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyor te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
168a2(khri brgyad): byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA
168a3(khri brgyad): 'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po 'artson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag / 
168a4(khri brgyad): gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa 'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun
168a5(khri brgyad): mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi
168a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
168a7(khri brgyad): byin pa dang // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA rol du gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'artson 'grus kyi
168a8(khri brgyad): rig tu phyin pa la gnas te/ phan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byab
168b1(khri brgyad): ngag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms zhing / de dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ 
168b2(khri brgyad): byang chub tu yongasasu bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan
168b3(khri brgyad): ba shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la
168b4(khri brgyad): bdag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang
168b5(khri brgyad): thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya/ nga chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha
168b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
168b7(khri brgyad): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
168b8(khri brgyad): pa la gnas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing chos thams cad la sgyums byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog ste/ de yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
169a1(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can
169a2(khri brgyad): thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha ro
169a3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
169a4(khri brgyad): la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang lnga na pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yon gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag
169a5(khri brgyad): gis/ 'khor gsum yong su dag par sbyin pa sbyin zhi nga / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
169a6(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab
169a7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
169a8(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ shes
169b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing / de pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag cha dang / gzugs
169b2(khri brgyad): brnyan dang / sprul pa lta bu'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
169b3(khri brgyad): ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
169b4(khri brgyad): tu yongasu bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan
169b5(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas te/ pha ro la tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed do// 
169b6(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug la/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myang bar yang mi byed cing / 
169b7(khri brgyad): de dag gis kyang mi 'bregs te/ de dog gis dbang gis kyang mi skye/ tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la yang snyoms par 'jug la/ ro myang ba
169b8(khri brgyad): mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs la/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bud ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs lam pas
170a1(khri brgyad): pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 
170a2(khri brgyad): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben par mthong nas gnas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mthong
170a3(khri brgyad): nas gnas kyang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi byed do// de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs
170a4(khri brgyad): pa'i go cha chen po yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa
170a5(khri brgyad): rA ri ribu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la/ phyog sa bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
170a6(khri brgyad): rnams kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhes bya ba zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhig/ sems can rnams kyang yongasu
170a7(khri brgyad): smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yong su dag par byed ces tshod du brjod cing bsngags pa yang gsungs la/ ming yang yongasu sgrogs shing / byang chub sems dpa'
170a8(khri brgyad): de'i sgra brjod pa yang mdzad la dbyangs rjesu sgrogs par yang mdzad do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
170b1(khri brgyad): chen po theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri 'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / sbyin pa'i pha
170b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga'
170b3(khri brgyad): ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te/ gnas pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa rdzogs par bya ste gnas pa dang / 
170b4(khri brgyad): de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen por gyur pa tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ kho na med pa/ 'dra/ na zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas
170b5(khri brgyad): 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khya ba par byas te/ gnas pa dang / de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan
170b6(khri brgyad): pa dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ kho ni med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin
170b7(khri brgyad): tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa// namakha'i khams kyis mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te/ gnas pa dang / de bzhin du na mkha'
170b8(khri brgyad): mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes maud min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa
171a1(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan rnams dang / tshang med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams te/ 
171a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ na mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang mtshan ma rnams kyis bsam gtan de dag dang / 
171a3(khri brgyad): tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ba na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang
171a4(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo bar byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par
171a5(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la gong ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri 'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
171a6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug ste/ gang gi
171a7(khri brgyad): che byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis gnas shing / de bsam gtan dang / tshad med
171a8(khri brgyad): mjog gi dregs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la ldang ban/ nam pa'i rnam pa dang / dgas dang / mtshan pa rnams yid la byed de// shes pa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong/ 
171b1(khri brgyad): ba de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang
171b2(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo bar byed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub
171b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bug/ zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
171b4(khri brgyad): byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur ba/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ kho na med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgom
171b5(khri brgyad): pos 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i kha mas kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs gcig khyab par byas te/ gnas shing phyogs bcu'i bar du khyab par
171b6(khri brgyad): byas te/ gnas pa dang / snying rje dang / ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang / ldan pa yang de bzhin te/ mi gnyis pa/ kho na med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
171b7(khri brgyad): ro'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran
171b8(khri brgyad): zla med pa/ gnod pa mang ba/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer khyab pa
172a1(khri brgyad): byas nas gnas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
172a2(khri brgyad): be de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gsol ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / chad
172a3(khri brgyad): med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzhan dag la yang brjod cing ston te/ rab tu 'tshal la rnam par 'byed de/ gsal bar byed cing de dag gi
172a4(khri brgyad): myang ba dang / nyes dmigs nges par 'thung ba yang chu la bzhin du ston pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
172a5(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag nyid kyis/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bas ma gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag gnon cing sgom ste/ bsam
172a6(khri brgyad): gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag lo yang gnas la/ 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa
172a7(khri brgyad): gzhan dag gis skabs mi 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
172a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs bzang
172b1(khri brgyad): 'bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam nas/ yid la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / yong su rtog pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang / nye bar nges par sems pa gang
172b2(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
172b3(khri brgyad): po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
172b4(khri brgyad): nyid du songasu bsngo zhing / brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba don byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems
172b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis tshe rnam pa thams tsod mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / 
172b6(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la snyoms par 'jug ci nga ldang yang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can tham
172b7(khri brgyad): cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha
172b8(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi che rnamo pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang sngon pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag ma
173a1(khri brgyad): dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bad
173a2(khri brgyad): med pa'i rnam pa dang / bri ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pas sa rtag pa de ni/ byang chub sems pa
173a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa chen po'o shes rabagyi pha rol tu phyin dang// tshe nga ldan pa shA 'i bu de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis theg
173a4(khri brgyad): chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dge par zhugs ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA 'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
173a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa ba dun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par tha
173a6(khri brgyad): ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas
173a7(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag sbom po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na bya
173a8(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dge par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po
173b1(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyams pa'i tingar dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab bo zhes mngon
173b2(khri brgyad): bar gzhol bar byed pa dang / snying b+h+rUM'iri tingange 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug kyang sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse bar nges par gzhol ba dang / dga' ba'i ting 'dzin
173b3(khri brgyad): la snyoms par 'jug cing bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad dgrol bar bya'o// sems can rnams la nges par gzhol ba dang / btang snyoms kyi ting 'dzin la snyoms
173b4(khri brgyad): bar 'jug cing sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la nges par gzhol bar byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams 'aspyod
173b5(khri brgyad): nga'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gong gi tshe/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / rtags dang / 
173b6(khri brgyad): mtshan ma dag la snyoms par 'jug cing / ldang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu mi bsngo ba ni/ byang chub
173b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ched med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
173b8(khri brgyad): gi tshe/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gos ma 'dres par gnas shing / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ 
174a1(khri brgyad): sa gnyis po de dag tu 'dod par mi byed kyi/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzod cing 'dod pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chad
174a2(khri brgyad): med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems
174a3(khri brgyad): bskyed pa dag gis mi dge ba'i chos spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa mi gtong ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
174a4(khri brgyad): tshang med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa
174a5(khri brgyad): de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de ngag la yod/ snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ bas ma gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
174a6(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye la/ de dag gis ro myang bar mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
174a7(khri brgyad): chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
174a8(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i sgoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar yong byed la/ 
174b1(khri brgyad): de yang mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / 
174b2(khri brgyad): smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog kyang nyan thos kyi skyon med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang mi 'jug pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
174b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA~M ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
174b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
174b5(khri brgyad): po'i theg pa chen po ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shes pa gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes
174b6(khri brgyad): pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po
174b7(khri brgyad): la yang dag par zhugs pa yino// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang chos thams cad la sems rnam par
174b8(khri brgyad): g.yeng ba med cing mnyam par gzhag par shes pa'o// tshe dang ldan popa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chu
175a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po yang dag par zhugs pa yin// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
175a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dpal
175a3(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /  ma dag ma ma kyos mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar
175a4(khri brgyad): shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de ni byang/ chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
175a5(khri brgyad): po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang
175a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug/ da ltar thung ba'i dus
175a7(khri brgyad): shes pa yang mi 'jug la/ de dus gsum po dag mi shes pa yang ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
175a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// 
175b1(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA li ri bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i kham su shes pa mi 'jug/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs
175b2(khri brgyad): med pa'i khamasu shes pa mi 'jug la/ de 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa yang ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan
175b3(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
175b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs ba yin no// tshwa dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
175b5(khri brgyad): chen po ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la shes pa mi 'jug/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / zag pa med
175b6(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yang shes pa mi 'jug la/ de 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams mi
175b7(khri brgyad): shes pa yang ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas po dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams mi shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
175b8(khri brgyad): de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
176a1(khri brgyad): po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces
176a2(khri brgyad): smraso// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya/ gang pos smras pa// tshe dang
176a3(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas la/ 
176a4(khri brgyad): des sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ na pa po yang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
176a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
176a6(khri brgyad): ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa yang de bzhin no// 
176a7(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas
176a8(khri brgyad): / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' snga mi dmigs/ yid la byed pa yang mi dmigs te/ tshe dang ljon pa shA ri'i bu de ltar ma
176b1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan
176b2(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid bsgom
176b3(khri brgyad): ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis/ bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir dngos
176b4(khri brgyad): bo med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom ste// de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgo mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
176b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gan sa pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
176b6(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom ste/ de
176b7(khri brgyad): yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir stong pa nyid dang
176b8(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres
177a1(khri brgyad): bdag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
177a2(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
177a3(khri brgyad): chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dmigasu med pa'i phyi
177a4(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni tha snya da tsam du zad par sheso// gzugs dmigasu med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste gzugs shes bya ba de yang ming du
177a5(khri brgyad): zong // rnam par shes pa'i bar du ngomagasu med pa 'iphyir/ 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'du byed dang // rnam
177a6(khri brgyad): ba shes pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// mig dmig su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ mig ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// yid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di
177a7(khri brgyad): lta ste/ yid ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad// khams rnams dang / skye mchod rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
177a8(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin no// nang stong pa nyid dmigs su
177b1(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
177b2(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar de ni ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos dmig su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// yang dag pa'i
177b3(khri brgyad): mtha' dmig su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba de ni
177b4(khri brgyad): ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dmig/ su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zado zhes bya ba
177b5(khri brgyad): shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa shrI ra'i bu de ltar na byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po lnga yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ro'i bu gzhan
177b6(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams yong su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug
177b7(khri brgyad): gi bar du sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas gang
177b8(khri brgyad): la gang 'ong ba'i mchod pa dang / rim gro byo bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams le bsti stang du byed do// bla mar byed do// ri mo byed// mchod par byed// 
178a1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to// de theg pa chen po de la zhon ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
178a2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yong su dag par byed do// sems can rnams kyang yongasu smin par byed la/ de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes
178a3(khri brgyad): kyang mi 'thung / sems can gyi 'du shes mi 'thung // de gnyi sasu med pa'i sa lo gnas te/ lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don byed rus pa de lta bu'i lus bsams
178a4(khri brgyad): bzhin du yong su 'dzin to// de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ye shes thob par gyur gyi bar du nam yang theg pa de dang / bral bar mi 'gyur ro// des rnam
178a5(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang // lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
178a6(khri brgyad): dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ 
178a7(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs
178a8(khri brgyad): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag kyang de'i bsngags pa brjod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ga ge mo zhes bya ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
178b1(khri brgyad): po 'di zhes bya ba zhig theg pa chen po la zhon nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// zhes
178b2(khri brgyad): snyan par sgrogs shing dbyangs brjod pa mdzad// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs
178b3(khri brgyad): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang de'i bsngags pa brjod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams ga go mo
178b4(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
178b5(khri brgyad): thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes snyan pa ra sgrogs shing dbyangs brjod pa mdzad// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sedang sems dpa' chen po
178b6(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi le'u zhes bya ste bcu gsum pa'o// / 
178b7(khri brgyad): bam po bcu pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das lo// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po begaso shes bgyi na/ bcom ldan
178b8(khri brgyad): 'das ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bgyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang
179a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha
179a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ dran
179a3(khri brgyad): bzhi bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi go cha 'gos// nang stong
179a4(khri brgyad): nyid kyi go cha dgos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ba gyi go cha bgos/ stobs kyi go cha bgos/ mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos/ 
179a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rna ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi
179a6(khri brgyad): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas khyab par byed cing g.yo bar yang byed/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi gnas rnamasu me rab tu zhi bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal
179a7(khri brgyad): ba'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams rab tu zhi bar byas te/ sems can de dag la sdug bsngal rnams zhi bar rig par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'
179a8(khri brgyad): de 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod cing dbyangs sgro'o// de nas sems can dmyal
179b1(khri brgyad): bde dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ bde ba dang / yid bde ba thob ste/ bde ba dang yid bde ba de nyid kyis/ sems can dmyal ba de dag nas byung nas/ gang dang gang na
179b2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te/ mthong zhing ma nyams par byar yod pa dang / lha dang / mir skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o// de bani
179b3(khri brgyad): du dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams byung nas/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dang
179b4(khri brgyad): der skye'o// de bzhin du shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byA nga phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / 
179b5(khri brgyad): steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bas khyab par byed cing / rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar yang byed de/ sems can dmyal ba thams
179b6(khri brgyad): cad kyi bar rnams su me rab tu zhi bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams rab tu zhi bar byas te/ sems can de dag la sdug bsngal rnams
179b7(khri brgyad): zhi bar rig par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' de 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal// zhes bya ba'i
179b8(khri brgyad): sgra brjod cing / dbyangs sgrog go/ de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ bde ba dang / yid bde ba thob ste/ bde ba dang / yid bde ba nyid kyis
180a1(khri brgyad): sems can dmyal ba de dag byung nas/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te/ mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byar yod pa dang / lha dang
180a2(khri brgyad): mir skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o// mir skyes nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mnyes par byed do// de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams dang
180a3(khri brgyad): gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams nas sems can de dag shi 'phos te/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o// 
180a4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po go cha chen po 'gos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhon gyi
180a5(khri brgyad): slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
180a6(khri brgyad): mngon par sprul la/ des mngon par sprul nas/ sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrogs te/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas
180a7(khri brgyad): kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas byung bar gyur na// rab 'byor
180a8(khri brgyad): 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan na ma/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob mo des/ sems can 'ga' yang sems can dmyal ba rnams dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / go shin/ 
180b1(khri brgyad): 'jig rten dag nas byung ba yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub
180b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa rnamasu sems can rnams ngan 'gro gsum po dag las yongasu dkrol yang / 
180b3(khri brgyad): sems can 'ga' yang yongasu bkrol bar gyur pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid de nye bar bzung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i
180b4(khri brgyad): phyir/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
180b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ go cha chen po bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi/ stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin
180b6(khri brgyad): du mngon par sprul te/ sdong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin du mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul
180b7(khri brgyad): par byed do// des 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas sbyin par byed do// de bzhin du btung ba dang / gos dang / bzhon pa da
180b8(khri brgyad): spos dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang / thug pa dang / phye ma dang / yo byad dang / gnas dang / mal cha dang / bgo ba dang / 'tshe ba'i yo byad dang / ci sman dang / 
181a1(khri brgyad): gser dang / bal dang / nor bu dang / rin po me dang / byi ru dang / dung dang / man shel dang / mu tig dang / rgyun dag dang / yo byang gang yang ru
181a2(khri brgyad): ngag sbyin par byed do// de zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin zhing yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan
181a3(khri brgyad): ba'i chos bston pa 'di nyid kyis chos ston to// sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
181a4(khri brgyad): par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor 'di lha ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan na mo/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma
181a5(khri brgyad): mkhas pa zhig gis lami po che'i bzhi mdor spyi bo phal po che'i mdun du/ nam skye ba'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la
181a6(khri brgyad): ni zas byin zhing / mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can gang
181a7(khri brgyad): la yang ci yang byin pa yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byung
181a8(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen pos 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprus te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin ni'i ma'i yo khyod gang yang tsho
181b1(khri brgyad): bar du byin na yang / sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab
181b2(khri brgyad): 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi
181b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin po la gnas te/ bsams bzhin du skye ba yo su 'dzin cing / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rig su skyes te/ de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas sems
181b4(khri brgyad): can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'go byed/ bsam gtan bani dang / tshad med 'o zhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la 'god
181b5(khri brgyad): par byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsub du nal 'god par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre sa pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la 'god par byed cing / sems
181b6(khri brgyad): can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang nam yang chos bstan pa de dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab
181b7(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i 'dun du/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po shig
181b8(khri brgyad): mngon par sprul nas/ dge ba'icu'i las kyi lam la~M kod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod na/ rang myor 'di ji snyam dus mos sgyu ma mkhan na ma/ snum
182a1(khri brgyad): mkhan gyi slob ma des/ sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la ga/ 
182a2(khri brgyad): pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
182a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos sems can grangs med chad med pa dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bso brgyad kyi bor dag la bkod kyang
182a4(khri brgyad): sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres dpa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la dkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir
182a5(khri brgyad): zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na tshe sa rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rang 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
182a6(khri brgyad): cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha
182a7(khri brgyad): rol 'byon pa la sbyor ning 'god par byed ngo do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod po'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can rnams bzod
182a8(khri brgyad): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'do la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos te/ 
182b1(khri brgyad): gal te sems can thams cad kyis bdag la dbyig pa dang / bong ba dang // khu tshur dang / lag cha dang / mtshon gyis 'debs kyang / de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' yang bskyed
182b2(khri brgyad): bar mi bya'o snyam du sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de lta bul 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyum mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis/ lom
182b3(khri brgyad): po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ 
182b4(khri brgyad): sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob mi des sems can 'ga' yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ba kod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
182b5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can grangs
182b6(khri brgyad): med tshad med bdag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod papo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nying
182b7(khri brgyad): nye bar brdung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nying yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
182b8(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
183a1(khri brgyad): cing 'dzud de/ 'god par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
183a2(khri brgyad): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing rnam pa thams
183a3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'gong par byeda'o// ra
183a4(khri brgyad): 'byor 'dra lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bani mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du/ skye bo'i tshogs
183a5(khri brgyad): chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bdu de de bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sbrum
183a6(khri brgyad): mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des/ sems can 'ga' yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor
183a7(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems
183a8(khri brgyad): can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bcud de bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin
183b1(khri brgyad): du bcug cing bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
183b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 
183b3(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
183b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pobasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad pasam gtan gyi pha d+mo'o/ byin po yang dag pa po dzin du lag cing 'jud / 
183b5(khri brgyad): 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la yang rnam par
183b6(khri brgyad): g.yeng ba 'am/ rnam par g.yeng ba med par yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
183b7(khri brgyad): la gnas te/ des de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bas mi gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de/ 'god par byed do// yang dag par 'dzin pa
183b8(khri brgyad): 'dug pa dag kyang blan me pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi du nim yang bas mi gtan gyilam tu phyin pa da bral ba yi hrI
184a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di sa ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor/ skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye
184a2(khri brgyad): tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de/ bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma
184a3(khri brgyad): mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa des/ sems can 'ga' yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing 'dzud de bkod pa yod snyam
184a4(khri brgyad): 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ni ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' se
184a5(khri brgyad): chen pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bcud de bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang bsam gtan gyi
184a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
184a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
184a8(khri brgyad): te/ sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug tsong 'dzud de 'god par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
184b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing bcud de 'god ce na/ rab 'byor
184b2(khri brgyad): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos gang la yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par
184b3(khri brgyad): byang ba'om/ tshur rol 'am/ pha rol mi dmig so// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ des
184b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan
184b5(khri brgyad): nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che 'i bo ni mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'o/ tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ shes rab
184b6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des/ sems can
184b7(khri brgyad): 'ga' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
184b8(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang
185a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ 
185a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po
185a3(khri brgyad): bgos pa ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du song zhing de ji ltar/ bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams
185a4(khri brgyad): de dag na/ sems can gang dag 'khod pa'i sems can de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'a rngon du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed// de bzhin du
185a5(khri brgyad): ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par
185a6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed
185a7(khri brgyad): ba la/ 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa nyid kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
185a8(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nu
185b1(khri brgyad): dag nu bya dang / 'og dang / phreng gi phyogs kyi phyogs ri me yang 'jig rten gyi khams gna'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags
185b2(khri brgyad): ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can gang dag 'khod pa'i sems can de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing 'jud de 'go
185b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin du ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
185b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du sems can de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud 'god la 'di lta ste// pha rol tu phyin
185b5(khri brgyad): badrug dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can de ngag kyang chos de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
185b6(khri brgyad): kyi bar du nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i
185b7(khri brgyad): bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ pha rol tu byin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bcud de bkod na/ rab 'byor
185b8(khri brgyad): 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma das/ sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bcud de bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ 
186a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
186a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos shar phyogs dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po dag gi sems can de dag thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod
186a3(khri brgyad): kyang / sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ 
186a4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen
186a5(khri brgyad): bo go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas shing / sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed de/ bdag gis
186a6(khri brgyad): sems can 'di snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di skad cig ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
