213b5(khri brgyad): dang / snabs dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / zhag dang / chu sar dang / dri ma dang / mgo bo dang / glad pa dang / 
213b6(khri brgyad): mig chu dang / rna spabs dag yod par lus 'di la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog go/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zhing pa'i spyang 'bras so ba dang / 'bru
213b7(khri brgyad): dang / til dang / 'bru dang / til dang / 'bras drus dang / mon sran sde'u dang / mon sran gre'u dang / sran chung dang / nas dang glo dang / yongs 'bru dang / 'bru
213b8(khri brgyad): sna tshogs kyis gang ba mig dang ldan pa'i mis phye ste brtags na/ 'di ltar 'di ni 'bras so pa yin no// 'din 'bru yin no// 'don til yin no// 'di ni 'bras drus
214a1(khri brgyad): yin no// 'di ni mon sran sderu yin no// 'di ni mon sran gre'u yin no// 'di ni sran chung yin no// 'di ni nas yin no// 'di ni gro yin no// 'di ni yungs
214a2(khri brgyad): 'bru yin no// snyam du sheso// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad// skra dang mgo bo man chad sen ma
214a3(khri brgyad): dang / spu dang / spags pa la thug gi bar du mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog ste/ lus 'di la ni skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / so
214a4(khri brgyad): dang / lpags shun dang / sha dang / rgyus pa dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / snying dang / mkhal ma dang / mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / mcher ba dang / long ka dang
214a5(khri brgyad): rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / lgang ba dang / gcin dang / bya sa dang / mchil ma dang / rdul dang / tshig dang / snabs dang / ngar snangs dang / rnag dang / mkhris pa dang / 
214a6(khri brgyad): bid kan dang / zhag dang chu ser dang / dri ma dang / mgo bo dang / klad pa dang / mig rdul dang / rna spabs dag yod do snyam du rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
214a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ nang gi lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing
214a8(khri brgyad): gnas te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe dur khrod na gnas pa na/ dur khrod du bor
214b1(khri brgyad): ba'i gzugs sna tshogs shi nas zhag gcig lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag gnyis lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag gsum lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag bzhi lon pa 'am/ shi nas
214b2(khri brgyad): zhag lnga lon pa 'am/ rnam par bam pa 'am/ rnam par sngos pa 'am/ rnam par rul pa 'am/ rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa dag mthong ba na/ de lus 'di yang 'di lta
214b3(khri brgyad): bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid de dang / ma bral ba yin no// zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na
214b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ 
214b5(khri brgyad): lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnaso// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po gang gi tshe dur khrod du mi ro bo rab shi nas zhag
214b6(khri brgyad): drug lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag bdun lon pa 'am/ bya rog rnams zi zhing 'dug pa 'am/ go bo dang / chun lag dang / bya rgod dang / skyugs bza ba dang / 
214b7(khri brgyad): sbyang ki dang / wa dang / khyi dag gam/ srogs chags kyi rigs gang yang rung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag za zhing / 'dug pa dag mthong na/ de lus 'di yang
214b8(khri brgyad): 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid 'di dang bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang / sbyor bar byed do// rab
215a1(khri brgyad): 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / 
215a2(khri brgyad): yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ phyi rol gyi lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnas so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ 
215a3(khri brgyad): dur khrod du mi ro bor ba rnam par zos pa dang / mi gtsang ba dang / rul ba dang / mnam pa dag mthong ba na/ de lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di
215a4(khri brgyad): lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid 'di dang bral ba yin no// zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul da dang sbyor bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na
215a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa sa bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jigarten la brnab sems dang yid mi bde bo rnam par bsal
215a6(khri brgyad): nas lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnaso// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ dur khrod du keng rus sha dang / khrag
215a7(khri brgyad): rari chags shing / rgyus pas drang brang du 'brel ba dag mthong na/ de lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid de
215a8(khri brgyad): dang ma bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can
215b1(khri brgyad): dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ lus la lus kyi rjesu lta zhing gnaso// rab 'byor gzhan yang
215b2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ dur khrod du keng rus sha dang / khrag med cing / rgyus pas ma 'brel ba dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa dag
215b3(khri brgyad): mthong ba na/ de yang lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no// zhes lus 'di nyid
215b4(khri brgyad): kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/ 
215b5(khri brgyad): 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ lus la lus kyi rjesu lha zhing gnaso// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
215b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ dur khrod du keng rus bzungs med cing gyes te/ dung sa la gtor ba lta bu dag mthong ba na/ de lus 'di yong 'di
215b7(khri brgyad): lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos de nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no// zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do// rab
215b8(khri brgyad): 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can can dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba
216a1(khri brgyad): rnam par bsal nas/ lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnaso// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
216a2(khri brgyad): gi tshe dur khrod du rus pa rnams sa la phyogs dang / phyogs 'tshams su rnam par 'thor te/ rkang pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/ rje ngar gyi rus pa rnams kyang
216a3(khri brgyad): gzhan na/ bairba'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/ dpyi'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhanan/ skal tshigs kyi rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/ rtsib ma'i rus pa rnams kyang
216a4(khri brgyad): gzhanan/ dpung ba'i rus pa rnams kya gzhan no// 'jing pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/ mig pa'i thod pa rnams kyang gnan na/ 'dug pa dag mtho
216a5(khri brgyad): nan/ de lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor
216a6(khri brgyad): byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi
216a7(khri brgyad): bo pa rnam par gos la na// lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gan so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ dur khrod du rus
216a8(khri brgyad): lo du ma lon pa rlung dang / nyi mas gdungs pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa dog mthong ba na/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos
216b1(khri brgyad): nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang
216b2(khri brgyad): ldan pas/ 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gan so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
216b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gang gi tshe// dur khrod du rus pa lo du ma lon pa sngo ba thi ba'i mdog ltar gyur pa/ zegs shing 'brul pa/ sir rdul dang 'dra bar gyur pa dag mthong ba na/ de lus
216b4(khri brgyad): 'di yang de lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do// 
216b5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan bas/ 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi 'dre ba
216b6(khri brgyad): rnam par bsal nas/ nang gi lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnaso// phyi'i lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnaso// nang dang phyi'i lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnaso// de bzhin du
216b7(khri brgyad): rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ tshor ba rnams dang / sems dang chos rnams la chos kyi rjes
216b8(khri brgyad): lta zhing gnaso// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
217a1(khri brgyad): po'i mig pachen po na 'ag ste yang dag par spong batshana'o// bzhig na/ bu 'byor 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sde/ 
217a2(khri brgyad): pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir/ 'dun pa bskyed cing rtsol la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / 
217a3(khri brgyad): sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes spang ba'i phyir/ 'dun po bskyed cing rtsol la brtson 'grus rngom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jug pa dang / dge ba 'am
217a4(khri brgyad): skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing tshul la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jig pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes
217a5(khri brgyad): pa rnams gnas pa dang / phyir zhing 'thung ba dang / mi brjed pa dang / nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rtsol la brtson 'grus rngom
217a6(khri brgyad): ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
217a7(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ rab
217a8(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dopa'i sems dpo' chen po 'dun pa'i ting 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang / 
217b1(khri brgyad): bral ba la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongasu bsgyur ba sgom pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / sems dang / dpyod pa'i ting 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul
217b2(khri brgyad): gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongasu bsgyur ba/ bsgom zhing de yang ma
217b3(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sem
217b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni'o de lta ste/ dbang po lnga'o// lnga gang zhe na/ dang / ba'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran
217b5(khri brgyad): pa'i dbang po dang / ting 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab
217b6(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ stobs lnga'o// lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus
217b7(khri brgyad): kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stob so// de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub
217b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'ad ste ste/ khyong chu
218a1(khri brgyad): kyi yan lag bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang
218a2(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting 'dzin
218a3(khri brgyad): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas
218a4(khri brgyad): pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur bsgom zhing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
218a5(khri brgyad): chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thog pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i
218a6(khri brgyad): lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i
218a7(khri brgyad): las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag par 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin to// de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
218a8(khri brgyad): te/ rab 'byor don byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
218b1(khri brgyad): ni 'di lta ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi ting 'dzin gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting 'dzin dang / smon pa med
218b2(khri brgyad): pa'i ting 'dzin to// de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni
218b3(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin ces bya'o// de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med par so sor rtog pa'i
218b4(khri brgyad): sems gnas pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni mtshan ma med par rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i ting 'dzin ces bya'o// de la smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin
218b5(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med/ par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa gang yin pa s+t+wa~M/ de ni smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar
218b6(khri brgyad): pa'i sgo smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin ces bya'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag gi ting 'dzin ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po
218b7(khri brgyad): yin te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di
218b8(khri brgyad): lta ste/ shes pa bcu gcig go/ bcu gau cag gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa
219a1(khri brgyad): dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes rtogs pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob shesu pa dang / 
219a2(khri brgyad): yongasu 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o// de la sdug bsngal shes pag zhen/ sdug bsngal mi skye bar shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni sdug bsngal
219a3(khri brgyad): shes pa zhes bya'o// de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ kun 'byung ba spang ba shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o// de la 'gog
219a4(khri brgyad): pa shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pa/ gang yin pa ste/ de ni 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o// de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/ 
219a5(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni lam shes pa zhes bya'o// de la zod pa shes pa gang zhe na/ 'dod chags
219a6(khri brgyad): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug zad pa shes pa gang yin pa'o// de la mi skye ba shes po gang zhe na/ srid par 'gro ba mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa'o// 
219a7(khri brgyad): de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/ phung po lnga po rnams bcos mar yongasu gcod pa'i shes pa gang yin pa'o// de la rje su rtogs par shes pa gang zhe na/ mig
219a8(khri brgyad): mi rtag pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag par shes pa ste/ de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / chos
219b1(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi bar du sbyar bar bya'o// de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/ sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi sems sems kyis shes pa gang
219b2(khri brgyad): yin pa'o// de la yong su 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na/ lam shes pa dang / yongasu zad pa shes pa'o// de la sgra ji bzhin pa shes pa gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
219b3(khri brgyad): pas sgra thams cad mkhyen pa gang yin pa'o// de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
219b4(khri brgyad): chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dbang po gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mi
219b5(khri brgyad): shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa dbang po'o// de la mi shes pa kun shes pa
219b6(khri brgyad): byed pa'i dbang po gang ne no// slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ti
219b7(khri brgyad): gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po snang ba med pa dregs pa 'dul ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o// de la kun shes pa'i dang
219b8(khri brgyad): po gang zhe na/ slob pa'i gang zag kun shes par gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / 
220a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/ de ni kun shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o// de la kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ mi slob pa'i
220a2(khri brgyad): gang zag dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
220a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/ 
220a4(khri brgyad): de ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ ra byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan ya
220a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ ting 'dzin gsumo// gsum gang zhe na/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i
220a6(khri brgyad): ting 'dzin dang / rtog pa med pa dpyod pa tsam gyi ting 'dzin dang / mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting 'dzin to// de la rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ 
220a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa
220a8(khri brgyad): dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ de ni rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin
220b1(khri brgyad): ces bya'o// de la rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar gang yin pa ste/ de ni rtog pa
220b2(khri brgyad): med pa la/ dpyod pa tsam gyi ting 'dzin ces bya'o// de la mi rtogs mi dmigs mi dpyod pa'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan gnyis pa las 'du shes med/ 
220b3(khri brgyad): 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar gang yin pa dag ste/ de ni mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting 'dzin ces bya'o// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems
220b4(khri brgyad): dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta s+ho/ rje suM dran pa
220b5(khri brgyad): bcu'o// bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rje su dran pa dang / chos rjesu dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjesu dran pa dang / 
220b6(khri brgyad): gtong ba rjesu dran pa dang / lha rje su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjesu dran pa dang / 'chi ba rje su dran pa dang / lus su gtogs pa rje su dran pa dang / dbugs rngub pa dang
220b7(khri brgyad): 'thung ba rjes su dran pa'o// de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rjesu dran par byed de/ rab 'byor rjesu dran pa bcu po de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
220b8(khri brgyad): chen po'i theg pa chen po yin na// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ tshad med pa bzhi'o// ba ni gang
221a1(khri brgyad): zhe na/ byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod
221a2(khri brgyad): ba med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te/ gnas pa
221a3(khri brgyad): dang / de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / tang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi
221a4(khri brgyad): gnyis pa/ kho na med pa/ 'gran zla me dang/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pa// sa/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i
221a5(khri brgyad): khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bdu khyab par byas nas gnas pa ste/ rab byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
221a6(khri brgyad): po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ bosam gtan bzhi'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dag las
221a7(khri brgyad): dben pa sdig pa mi dge pa'i chos rnamos las dben pa to/ ba dngu 'acas pa/ spyod pa dang bcas pa/ driben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bed ba can bsam ga
221a8(khri brgyad): da po drungs te gnas pa dang / de rtog pa dang spyod 'dang bral ni nang sa su dong ste/ sems kyi rgyung gizag tu byung ches rtog pa med pa dbyed pa med pa'i ti yin
221b1(khri brgyad): skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang / shes
221b2(khri brgyad): bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde gnas pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum
221b3(khri brgyad): pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bde ba yang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal
221b4(khri brgyad): yang ma yin/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yong su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs nas gnas te/ rab 'byor don byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
221b5(khri brgyad): po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor pa/ zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ bo'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
221b6(khri brgyad): pa bzhi'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams rnam par nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du
221b7(khri brgyad): shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nu mkha' mthara' yaso snyam nas/ na mkha' mthara' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du na mkhar mtha' yas
221b8(khri brgyad): skye mched las yang dag pa 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mthar las snyam nas/ rnam gos mthar yis skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam thathams cad du
222a1(khri brgyad): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang medo snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam
222a2(khri brgyad): pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub
222a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lto ste/ rnam pa
222a4(khri brgyad): thar pa brgyad do// brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gzugs rnams lo lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang / po'o// gzugs med par 'du shes pas
222a5(khri brgyad): phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par tharapa gnyis pa'o// sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa
222a6(khri brgyad): thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi
222a7(khri brgyad): byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yaso snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha'
222a8(khri brgyad): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yaso snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par
222b1(khri brgyad): thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang mdo snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa
222b2(khri brgyad): 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes mod min skye mched bsgrubs te/ 
222b3(khri brgyad): gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshar
222b4(khri brgyad): 'gog pa bsgrubs te/ gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgya nga ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor
222b5(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// dgu
222b6(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dag la dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba
222b7(khri brgyad): can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongasu dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med
222b8(khri brgyad): pa/ pyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bo can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang
223a1(khri brgyad): bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang ldan pa shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang
223a2(khri brgyad): ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa gtang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te/ gnas pa dang / de bde ba yang spangs nas sdug
223a3(khri brgyad): bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ btang snyoms dang / dran pa
223a4(khri brgyad): yongasu dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du// thugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ 
223a5(khri brgyad): thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed bas/ na mkha' mtha' yos snyam nas/ na mkhar
223a6(khri brgyad): mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ni mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yos/ 
223a7(khri brgyad): snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te/ gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 
223a8(khri brgyad): ci yang medod snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te/ gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das
223b1(khri brgyad): nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das
223b2(khri brgyad): te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor
223b3(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dri lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gnas la yang gnas
223b4(khri brgyad): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang
223b5(khri brgyad): da ltar byung ba'i las rnams dang / las yang dag par len pa rnams kyi gnas dang / rnam par smin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / 'jig
223b6(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa/ khams du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mos pa sna
223b7(khri brgyad): tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi
223b8(khri brgyad): rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam pa
224a1(khri brgyad): thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
224a2(khri brgyad): rab tu shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rje su dran pa dang / lha'i mig gis 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
224a3(khri brgyad): bu dang / dag pa rnams zang pas zag pa myed pa'i sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol bya dang / tshe 'di 'di la rang gi mngon par shes pas
224a4(khri brgyad): mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te/ gnas no/ nga bdag gi skye ba ni zang ngo // tshangs par spyod/ ba ni spyod do// bya ba ni byaso// byin chad 'di lta bu med
224a5(khri brgyad): do snyam du rab tu shes shing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu shes pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
224a6(khri brgyad): po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yang dag
224a7(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes dam bcas pa na/ kye ma de la chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / 
224a8(khri brgyad): tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na/ chos dang 'thun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol gyi snyam pa'i rgyu
224b1(khri brgyad): yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ste/ 'dir rgyu de yang dag par rje su ma mthong bas bde ba thob cing / bag tsha ba med pa thob la/ mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyi khyu mchog
224b2(khri brgyad): po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud
224b3(khri brgyad): dam/ mangs pa 'am/ su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun pas/ 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa/ bdag gis bskor bar bya'o// zhes bya ba dang / 
224b4(khri brgyad): zag bzong zhes dam bcas na/ kye mde la khyod kyis zag bu 'di dag mdzad do zhes lha de bcas pa dang / 'dro dang bcas padodang / chas
224b5(khri brgyad): pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zi dang bcas pa'i skye dgu ri 'jig rten na/ chos dang 'thun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de
224b6(khri brgyad): yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ 'di rgyu de yang dag par rje su ma mthong bas/ bde ba mthong cing bag tsha ba med pa thob la/ mi 'jigs pa thob pa ste/ gnas
224b7(khri brgyad): kyi khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am
224b8(khri brgyad): lha'im/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'i ma/ su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang / ngas
225a1(khri brgyad): gang dag par du gsod pa'i cho sa gsungs pa de dag bsten na/ bar du gcod pa'i cho su mi 'gyur ba de'i gnas med pa de la/ de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod
225a2(khri brgyad): par mi 'bru'o zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun
225a3(khri brgyad): bar 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyud yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ 'dir rgyu de yang dag pa brje su ma mthong bas bde ba thob cing / bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi
225a4(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyi khyu mchog rlabs po tshe'i gnasu dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgo'o// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ 
225a5(khri brgyad): bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig rte na du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes
225a6(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / ngas 'phags pa nges par 'byin pa'i lam gang dag bstan te/ dbyed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par nges par 'byung ba de dag bsgrubs na/ sdug bsngal
225a7(khri brgyad): yang dag par zad par mi 'gyur ba de'i gnos med pa de la/ de dag bsgrubs kyang zag pa zad par mi 'gyuro zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa
225a8(khri brgyad): dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na/ chos dang 'thun par 'ga'i nag bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rje su mi mthong
225b1(khri brgyad): ste/ 'dir rgyu de yang dag par rje su ma mthong bas/ bde ba thob cing bag tsha ba med pa thob la/ mi 'jigs pa thob ste gnas kyi khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnasu dam bca'o// 
225b2(khri brgyad): 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrago/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ su yang rung bas
225b3(khri brgyad): chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o// de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa
225b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ so so yang dag
225b5(khri brgyad): par rig pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par
225b6(khri brgyad): rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o// de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rig pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
225b7(khri brgyad): po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ba
225b8(khri brgyad): brgyad de/ bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi nub mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas/ 
226a1(khri brgyad): 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa dang / bdudu dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lgad/ 
226a2(khri brgyad): mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis rje su bsten nas gang gi nub mo phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu
226a3(khri brgyad): mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang / btso med pa dang / bsnyel ba med pa dang / tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang / sems
226a4(khri brgyad): mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang / so sor ma brtag/ sa pra'i btang snyoms med pa dang / 'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa
226a5(khri brgyad): dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting 'dzin nyam sa pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang / 
226a6(khri brgyad): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa dang / lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las
226a7(khri brgyad): thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang / 'das pa'i
226a8(khri brgyad): dus la ma chags ma thigs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs po'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / da ltar gyi dus lam/ 
226b1(khri brgyad): chags pa thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa'o// de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ 
226b2(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dis s+ho/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams te/ gzungs
226b3(khri brgyad): kyi sgo rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yi ge'i tshul mnyam pa nyid dang / yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ges 'jug pa'o// de la yi ge'i sgo dang / yigs 'jug
226b4(khri brgyad): pa gang zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni/ bzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// ra zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad
226b5(khri brgyad): kyi sgo yin no// ba zhes bya ba ni don dam par khyo par med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// do//  zhes bya ba ni 'chi 'a bo dang / skye ba mi
226b6(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// na zhes bya ba ni mang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis meng po'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// 
226b7(khri brgyad): la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing srid pa'i khri shing gi rgyu dang rkyen yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// da zhes bya ba ni dul 'ang
226b8(khri brgyad): dul bar gnas pa yongasu nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// bo zhes bya ba ni bcings pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// 
227a1(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba ni khrag khrug dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// 
227a2(khri brgyad): bzhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam gyi sgra yang dag par chad pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo can/ 
227a3(khri brgyad): ya zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// sta zhes bya ba ni khengs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// 
227a4(khri brgyad): zhes bya bon byed pa'o ma dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// sa zhes bya ba ni mnom pa nyid las mi 'da' zhing mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir ches thams
227a5(khri brgyad): cad kyi sgo yin no// ma zhes bya ba ni nga yir 'dzin pa mi 'ami gas pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// ga zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad
227a6(khri brgyad): kyi sgo yin no// tha zhes bya ba na gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// shA zhes
227a7(khri brgyad): bya ba ni dbugs mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas mi
227a8(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// kha zhes bya ba ni na mkha' dong mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// k+Sho zhes bya ba ni zad pa
227b1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// nA zhes bya ba ni ye shes mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// ha zhes bya ba ni rgyu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos
227b2(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi sgo yin no// b+ha zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// cha zhes bya ba ni bdog pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo
227b3(khri brgyad): yin no// sma zhes bya ba ni dran pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// ha zhes bya ba ni bod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// tas rbe
227b4(khri brgyad): bya ba ni chos rnams la mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// g+ha zhes bya ba ni stug po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// tha zhes bya ba ni
227b5(khri brgyad): rnam par bsgrubs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams ca/ byed kyi sgo yin no// Na zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa me nga ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// pa zhes
227b6(khri brgyad): bya ba ni 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// skra zhes bya ba ni phung po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// rdza zhes bya ba ni rgab mi
227b7(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// Ta zhes bya ba ni sdig pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir
227b8(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// ha zhes bya ba ni ngar 'dzin po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// de yan chad ni yi ger brjod pa med do// de ci'i phyir
228a1(khri brgyad): zhen/ 'di ltar gang la yang gang gis tha skad 'dogs pa dang / gang gis brjod pa dang / gang gis bstan pa dang / gang gis rtogs par
228a2(khri brgyad): byed pa dang / gang gis mthong ba'i ming ci yang med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni na mkha' dang 'dra bar khong du chud par bya'o// 
228a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge bstan pa la 'jug pa 'di ni gzungs kyi sgrol 'jug pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i sems
228a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gang lo// a zhes bya ba la sogs ba'i yig la mkhas par bya ba'idi shes pa de ni sgra gang la yang thogs par mi 'gyur zhing / chos
228a5(khri brgyad): thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur te/ sgra shes pa la mkhas payang thob par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub
228a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la/ a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag
228a7(khri brgyad): thos la/ thos nas kyang tshul gyis nges par gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis 'dzin pa dang / 'chang po dang / klog po dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag/ 
228a8(khri brgyad): la yang rgya cher ston pa de la ni lan yon nyi shu yod pa shes pa gyi'o// nyi shug zhin/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / blo gros dang ljon par 'gyur ba dang / 
228b1(khri brgyad): rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / blo dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / brtan pa dang / ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab dang
228b2(khri brgyad): ldan par 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo 'di yang tshegs chung ngus 'thob cing som nyi med la yid gnyis za bar mi 'gyur ba dang / 
228b3(khri brgyad): gzhan dag las tshig 'jam po thos na yang rje su chags par mi 'gyur la/ tshig rtsub po thos na yang zhe 'dras par mi 'gyur ba ste/ mtho bar mi 'gyur dma' bar mi 'gyur
228b4(khri brgyad): zhing tha mal par gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sgra la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / phung po la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / khams la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / 
228b5(khri brgyad): skye mched la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba da nga/ rgyu la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rkyen la
228b6(khri brgyad): mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / chos nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / pha rol
228b7(khri brgyad): gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul bya ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang / lha'i rna ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rje su dran pa shes pa la
228b8(khri brgyad): mkhas pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba shis po la mkhas pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa shes pa la mkha
229a1(khri brgyad): pa dang / 'gro ba la mkhas pa dang / ldog pa la mkhas pa dang / spyod lam la mkhas par 'gyur ba ste/ phan yon nyi shu bo de dag thob pa
229a2(khri brgyad): 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// 
229a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong po las/ gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu drug pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu
229a4(khri brgyad): phyin pa khri brgyad stong po/ bam po bcu gsum/ dang/ rab 'byor khyod 'di skad dultar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg
229a5(khri brgyad): po chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni sa
229a6(khri brgyad): nas sar 'phar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pas sa nas sar ji ltar 'phar zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad
229a7(khri brgyad): 'pho ba med pas// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang yang 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'o ma 'pho ba 'am/ nye bar 'pho ba med pa'i phyiraro// 'on kyang chos thams cad kyis gang yin
229a8(khri brgyad): ba de la yang rlom semasu mi byed cing mi sems lal sa yongasu sbyong bar yang byed do// sa de yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa/ 
229b1(khri brgyad): yongasu sbyong ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po rab tu dga' ba la gnas pas/ yongasu sbyang ba bcu bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/ lhag pa'i
229b2(khri brgyad): bsam pa yongasu sbyang bar byas te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya ba dang / mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir phan par bya ba'i dngos po yongasu sbyang ba dang / sen mi dmigs
229b3(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongasu sbyang ba dang / sbyin par bya ba dang / sbyin pa po dang / lon pa po dmigs pa'i phyir gtong ba yongasu sbyang
229b4(khri brgyad): ba dang / de dag gis rlom semasu mi byed pa'i phyir dge ba'i ba shos gnyen la brten pa yongasu sbyang ba dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos tshol ba yongs sgyu
229b5(khri brgyad): ba dang / khyim mi dmigs pa'i phyir rgyun mi chod par mngon par 'byung ba yongasu sbyang ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i mtshan mi dmigs pa'i phyir
229b6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongasu sbyang ba dang / chos kyi dbye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos rnam par 'grel pa yongasu sbyang ba dang / chos kyi yod pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir
229b7(khri brgyad): nga rgyal gyis khengs pa nges par gzhom pa yongasu sbyang ba dang / tshig mi dmigs pa'i phyir dben pa'i tshig yongasu sbyang ba ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' som
229b8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos dang po la gnas pas yongasu sbyang ba bcu po 'di dag bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas
230a1(khri brgyad): pas rtag tu chos brgyad yid la bya zhing de dag la nan tan bya'o// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste tshul khrims yongasu dag pa dang / byas pa gzo zhing byas pa
230a2(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa dang / mchog tu dga' zhing dga' ba nyam su myong bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yong su mi btang ba dang / snying rje chen
230a3(khri brgyad): po mngon du bya ba dang / bla ma rnams la dad pas gus shing ston pa'i 'du shes kyis sri zhu che ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams brtson pas yongasu tshol ba ste/ rab 'byor
230a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis la gnas pas chos brgyad po de dag rtag tu yid la bya zhing de dag la nan tan bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
230a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gsum pa lag/ nus pas chos lnga la gnas par bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste mang du thos pas chog mi shes
230a6(khri brgyad): shing de la yang yig la mngon par zhen par mi bya ba dang / zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel par byed la des kyang rlom semasu mi byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
230a7(khri brgyad): zhing yongasu dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yong su bsngo la/ des kyang rlom semasu mi byed pa dang / 'khor ba dpag tu med pas yongasu mi skyo zhing / des kyang rlom
230a8(khri brgyad): semasu mi byed pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa la gnas shing des kyang rlom sems mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gsum
230b1(khri brgyad): pa la gnas pas/ chos lnga po de dag la gnas par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas/ chos bcu
230b2(khri brgyad): yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya zhing de yongasu spang bar mi bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dgon pa la gnas pa yongasu mi btang ba dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang / 
230b3(khri brgyad): chog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa mi btang ba dang / bslab pa yongasu mi btang ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad ba dang / mya ngan
230b4(khri brgyad): las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongasu btang ba dang / sems mi 'dre ba dang / dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba ste/ rab
230b5(khri brgyad): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas/ tshes bcu po de dag yongasu btang bar mi bya zhing yang dag par blangs te gnas par
230b6(khri brgyad): bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas tshes bcu yongasu sbyang bar bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khyim
230b7(khri brgyad): dang 'dris par byed pa yongasu spang bar bya zhing / dge slong dang / dge slong ma 'dris par byed pa yongasu spang bar bya ba dang / khyim la ser sna byed pa yongasu spang bar bya ba
230b8(khri brgyad): dang / 'du 'dzi'i gnas yong su spang bar bya ba dang / gnod sems yong su spang bar bya ba dang / bdag la bstod pa yongasu spong bar bya zhing / gzhan la smod pa yongasu
231a1(khri brgyad): spang bar bya ba dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongasu spang bar bya ba dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / khengs pa yongasu spang bar byal
231a2(khri brgyad): dang byin ci log yongasu spangs par bya ba dang / the tshom yongasu spang bar bya ba dang // 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi bag chags yongasu spang bar bya ba ste/ 
231a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas/ chos bcu po de dag yong su sbyang bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sam
231a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos drug pa la gnas pas chos drug yongasu rdzogs par bya ste/ drug gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs rdzogs par bya'o// gzhan yang
231a5(khri brgyad): drug yongasu srung bar bya ba ste/ drug gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sems yong su spang bar bya ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongasu spang bar bya ba dang / yongasu yi 'chang
231a6(khri brgyad): pa'i sems yongasu spang bar bya ba dang / spong ba mthong na/ sems zhum par mi bya ba dang / dngos po thams cad yongasu btang nas yid mi bde bar mi bya ba dang / slong ba
231a7(khri brgyad): bskrad par mi bya ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos drug pa la gnas pas chos drug po 'di dag yong su spang bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
231a8(khri brgyad): chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen pos bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyid shu mi bya'o// nyi shug zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag tu 'dzin por mi bya ba dang / sems can du
231b1(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / chad par 'dzin pa dang / rtag par 'dzin pa dang / mtshan ma'i 'du shes dang / rgyur lta ba dang / ming dang
231b2(khri brgyad): gzugs la mngon par zhen pa dang / phung po la mngon par zhen pa dang / khams la mngon par zhen pas skye mched la mngon par zhen pa dang / khams gsum la mngon par
231b3(khri brgyad): zhen pa dang / khams gsum la lhag par zhen pa dang / khams gsum la chags pa dang / sangs rgyasu lta ba la brten cing mngon par zhen pa dang / cho su lta ba la brten
231b4(khri brgyad): cing mngon par zhen pa dang / dge 'dun du lta ba la brten cing mngon par zhen pa dang / tshul khrim su lta ba la brten cing mngon par zhen pa dang / chos rnams
231b5(khri brgyad): stong ngo zhes bya bas sgyid lug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang 'ag la ba ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi shu
231b6(khri brgyad): bo de dag mi bya'o// sa bdun pa la gnas pa des chos nyi shu yong su rdzogs par bya s+ho/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid rtogs pa dang / mtshan ma med pa mngon
231b7(khri brgyad): sum du bya bo dang / smon pa med pa shes pa dang / 'khor gsum yong su dag po dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse zhing snying rje ba dang / sems can de dag la brtsa
231b8(khri brgyad): par mi bya ba dang / chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta zhing de la yang mngon par zhen par mi bya ba dang / yang dag pa'i tshul rtogs shing des rlom sems yang mi bya ba dang / 
232a1(khri brgyad): mi skye bar bzod pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / tshul gcig tu bstan pa dang / chos thams cad la rtog pa yang dag par gzhom pa dang / lta ba bzlog pa
232a2(khri brgyad): dang / nyon mongs pa bzlog pa dang / zhi gnas nges par sems pa dang / lhag mthong la mkhas pa'i sa dang / sems dul ba dang / sems zhi ba dang / shes pa thogs pa med
232a3(khri brgyad): bya dang / rjesu chags pa'i sa ma yin pa dang / ning gang du 'dod par 'gro ba ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdun pa la gnas pas chos kyi
232a4(khri brgyad): 'ode dag yi su rdzogs par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas/ chos bzhi yongasu rdzogs par bya ste/ 
232a5(khri brgyad): bani gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems la 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lta zhing
232a6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba de dag kyang yong su bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bya zhing sangs rgyas kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa ste/ 
232a7(khri brgyad): 'byor chos bzhi po de dag yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems da po'i sems dpa' chen pos brgyad pa la gnas pas/ chos bani yongasu
232a8(khri brgyad): por bya ste/ bani gang zhe na// dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa dong / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par bya ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin 'atsun mi 'chad ba
232b1(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus yongasu bsgrub cing bsams bzhin du srid pa nye bar len
232b2(khri brgyad): bste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos brgyud pa la gnas pas chos bzhi po dag yong su rdzogs par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
232b3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas chos bcu gnyis yongasu rdzogs par bya ste/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lto ste/ smon lam mtha' yas pa yongasu gzung ba
232b4(khri brgyad): de smon lam ji lta ji lta bu 'debus pa de lta de lta bur 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding
232b5(khri brgyad): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa khong du chud pa dang / spobs pa'i klung khong du chud pa nga / mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / 
232b6(khri brgyad): rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / rus phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / skye ba phun sum tshogs pa ste/ mngon
232b7(khri brgyad): par 'thung ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / yon tan thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rab 'byor
232b8(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas chos bcu gnyis po de dag yong su rdzogs par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
233a1(khri brgyad): bos bcu pa la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
233a2(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu sbyang bar bgyi ba gang lags/ 
233a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa gang yin pa ste/ 
233a4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu sbyong ba yin no// de la sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yongasu sbyang ba
233a5(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba dag gis chang med pa bzhi po byams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms
233a6(khri brgyad): mngon par bsgrub pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yongasu sbyang ba zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtos
233a7(khri brgyad): ba gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad lnga rnam par rtog pa med par sbyin pa sbyin pa ste/ de ni gtong ba yongasu sbyang ba zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
233a8(khri brgyad): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa yongasu sbyang ba gang zhe na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i po shes gnyen dag ni/ gang dag
233b1(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par 'dzud cing / 'jog la rab tu 'god par byed pa'i dge pa'i bshes gnyen de dag la brten pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / 
233b2(khri brgyad): sri zhu byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa yongasu sbyang ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
233b3(khri brgyad): chen po'i chos tshol ba yongasu sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis chos tshol bar byed la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
233b4(khri brgyad): yang mi ltung ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dang / 'asems dpa' chen po'i chos tshol ba yongasu sbyang ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
233b5(khri brgyad): chen po'i rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'byung ba yongasu sbyang ba gang zhe na/ tshe rabs thams cad du 'dre ba med par mngon par 'byung zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
233b6(khri brgyad): bstan pa la yang rab tu 'byung la/ su yang de'i bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyun mi 'chad par mngon
233b7(khri brgyad): par 'thung ba yongasu sbyang ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongasu sbyang ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong
233b8(khri brgyad): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob kyi bor du nams kyang sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor don byang chub sems
234a1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongasu sbyangs pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam
234a2(khri brgyad): par 'grel pa yongasu sbyang ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs kyang rung / mya ngan las 'das kyang rung / 
234a3(khri brgyad): sems can rnams la chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzung po/ ma
234a4(khri brgyad): 'dres pa yong su rdzogs pa/ yongasu dag pa/ oM dusu byang ba 'di lta ste/ mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyi sa bskrad pa'i sde dang / lung bstan pa'i sde dang // tshigs
234a5(khri brgyad): su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng bzhi'i sde dang / de ltar thung ba'i sde dang / skye sa pa'i rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / 
234a6(khri brgyad): rmad du zung ba'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde yang dag par ston pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
234a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par 'grel pa yongasu sbyang ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal gyis khengs pa nges par gzhom pa yongasu sbyang ba
234a8(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ nga rgyal gyis khengs pa gzhom pa gang gis nams kyang rigs dma' ba rnam su skye bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal
234b1(khri brgyad): gyis khengs pa nges par gzhom pa yongasu sbyang ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongasu sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ji skad smras
234b2(khri brgyad): pa de bzhin du byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongasu sbyang ba yin no// rab 'byor bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
234b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pas yongasu sbyang bar bya ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di
234b4(khri brgyad): lnga ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems pa / gzhan yang 'chalo pa'i tshul khrimasu byed pa byang chub la bar chad byed pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag
234b5(khri brgyad): yid la mi byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po'i tshul khrim su dag pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
234b6(khri brgyad): byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na phan chung ngu zhig byas na yang 'khor ba'i mtha'
234b7(khri brgyad): bar du chud mi gzon na/ chen po lta ci smos te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa
234b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa gong zhe ni/ gang sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems med pa ste/ de ni byang chub
235a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog tu dga' ba
235a2(khri brgyad): masu myong bar bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste theg pa gsum po dag la yongasu smin par byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog tu dga' ba nyams
235a3(khri brgyad): myong bar bya ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongasu mi btang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can thams cad yongasu skyob
235a4(khri brgyad): pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongasu mi btang ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du
235a5(khri brgyad): bya ba gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 2 dri snyam du sems te/ sems can re re'i don gyi
235a6(khri brgyad): phyir yang bdag skal po chen po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal ba dag tu 'dug la/ sems ca na de sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ma bzhag gi ba
235a7(khri brgyad): du/ der gcad pa dang / gshag pa dang / brdung ba dang / brtson pa dang / bsreg pa dag kyang nyim su myong bar bya'o snyam ste/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi phyir
235a8(khri brgyad): mngon par spro zhing yongasu mi skyoba'i bar du ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i sem
235b1(khri brgyad): dba' chen po'i bla ma rnams la dad bas gus shing sri'u che bzhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla ma rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes 'jog pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
235b2(khri brgyad): chen po'i bla ma la dad pas gus shing sri'u che ba zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams brtson pas tshol ba gang zhe na/ 'di ste/ 
235b3(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ las gzhan mi byed par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongasu tshol ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha
235b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa rnams brtson pas tshol ba zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas chog mi shes pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
235b5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi kha mas 'di 'am/ phyogs bcu khor yug gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dag tu gang cig sungs pa de thams
235b6(khri brgyad): cang gzungs par bya'o snyam du chog mi shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas chog mi shes pa yin no// de la byang chu
235b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel bar byed pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sngon kyang chos
235b8(khri brgyad): kyi sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des tha na byang chub la yang re ba med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel par byed
236a1(khri brgyad): pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongasu bsngo ba ga
236a2(khri brgyad): zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byed pa bdag dang gzhan gyi sems kyi zhing yongasu dag par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongasu sgyur
236a3(khri brgyad): pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyis yong su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yong su bsngo ba yino// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
236a4(khri brgyad): po'i 'khor ba dpag tu med pas yong su mi sngo ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtag pa ste/ dge ba'i ru ba gang dag gis nye bar brtan pa na/ sems can rnams kyi
236a5(khri brgyad): yong su smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yuyongasu dag par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par
236a6(khri brgyad): gyur gyi bar du rnams kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor ba dpag tu med pas yong su mi skyo ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa
236a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la smon pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
236a8(khri brgyad): kho ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa la gnas pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yong su mi btang ba gang zhe na/ nyan thos
236b1(khri brgyad): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'dar ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongasu mi btang ba yin no// 
236b2(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub kyang mi 'dod pa gang yin pa ste/ 
236b3(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams
236b4(khri brgyad): cang mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang rlom semasu mi byed pa/ gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga shes pa yin no// de la
236b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgra nges pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa mi 'a tang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos zab mo dag la
236b6(khri brgyad): nges par sems pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa mi btang ba yin no// 
236b7(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongasu mi btang ba gang zhe na/ gang la bslab pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems
236b8(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yong su btang ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa gang zhe na/ 'dod pa
237a1(khri brgyad): la sems mi bskyed pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smang ba yin no// de la byang
237a2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang chos thams cad la mngon par 'du byed pa
237a3(khri brgyad): med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang / ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
237a4(khri brgyad): chen po'i bdog pa thams cad yongasu btang ba gang zhe na/ nang dang phyi rol gyi chos rnams 'dzin par mi bye dab gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems
237a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dog pa thams cad yongasu btang ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dre ba gang zhe na/ 
237a6(khri brgyad): gang rnam par shes pa gnas pa rnams la de'i sems mi sbyor ba ste// de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dre ba yin no// de la bya
237a7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba gang zhe na/ dngos po thams cad yid la mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems
237a8(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang / 'dris par byed pa yongasu spang
237b1(khri brgyad): ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing brdzus te/ skye ba dang / mgo bregs shing ngur smrig gyon pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems
237b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang / 'dris par byed pa yongasu spang ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong dang / dge
237b3(khri brgyad): slong ma dang / 'dris par byed pa yongasu spang ba gang zhe na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / se gol togs pa srad du yang lhan cig mi gnas shing / 
237b4(khri brgyad): de dag med na yang yong su yi 'chad par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang 'dris par byed pa yongasu
237b5(khri brgyad): spang ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim la ser sna byed pa yongasu spang ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
237b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad sbyar bar byas no// sems can 'di
237b7(khri brgyad): ngag ni rang gi bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur pa ma yin gyis/ 'di la bdag gis ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
237b8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos khyim la ser sna byed pa yongasu spang bar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongasu spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 
238a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du 'dzi'i nang du gnas na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas yod pa 'am/ de dang ldan pa'i gtam gyi glang
238a2(khri brgyad): ldang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ de dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par mi bya ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems
238a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri 'du'i dza'i gnas yongasu spang ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnod sems yongasu spyang 'a bya ba ji lta bu
238a4(khri brgyad): na/ gang gnod sems dang / rnam par chi ba'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang / 'thab pa'i sems dang / rtsod pa'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed pa ste/ de na
238a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sem sa yongasu spang ba yin no// de la byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag la bstod
238a6(khri brgyad): pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ gang nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag la bstod pa yongasasu
238a7(khri brgyad): spang ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhin la smod pa yo su spang po gang zhi na/ 'di lta ste/ phyi rol gyi chos rnams yang dag par rjesu mi
238a8(khri brgyad): mthong ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la spod pa yongasu spang ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma / 
238b1(khri brgyad): 'gu'i las kyi lam rnams yo su spang bu bya 'ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di dag ni bde 'gro la yang bar du gcod par byed na/ 'phags pa'i lam lta ci spros shing / byang chub
238b2(khri brgyad): la lta ci smos pa ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongasu spang bar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
238b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongasu spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos ci yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong na/ gang gis lhag par rlom semasu byed pa'i lhag
238b4(khri brgyad): bar lhag la yod ces de ltar lhag pa'i de rgyal spong ba bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na pos ji ltar khengs pa yong su spang por bya zhe na/ 
238b5(khri brgyad): ltar gang la de'i khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de ya nga dag par rje su mi mthong ba ste/ de ltar byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khengs pa yong su
238b6(khri brgyad): spang bar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log yongasu spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ dngos po rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang
238b7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log yongasu spang bar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
238b8(khri brgyad): gi bag chags yo su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe slong dang / gti mug rnams kyi dngos po yang dag par rje sa mi mthong ba ste/ de ltar byang chu
239a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi bag chags yongasu spang bar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' se
239a2(khri brgyad): chen pos sa drug pa la chos drug yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
239a3(khri brgyad): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'dron 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ 
239a4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa drug po de dag yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang pha rol tu phyin
239a5(khri brgyad): pa drug po 'di dag la gnas nas/ shes bya'i rgya mtsho'i rnam pa lnga'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to// phyin te phyin par gyur to// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das
239a6(khri brgyad): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / brjod du med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa
239a7(khri brgyad): drug po rnam pa yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang nyan thos kyi sems yo su spang bar bya ste/ 'di ltar drin
239a8(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyirararo// rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yong su spang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir// yong su yid
239b1(khri brgyad): ba'i sems yong su spang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir// slob pa mthong na/ sems zhum par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
239b2(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir// dngos po thams cad yong su btang nas yid mi bde bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir
239b3(khri brgyad): sems dang po bskyed phyin chad rtag tu sbyin pa sbyin par bya zhing sems gsog tu mi bya ste/ chos drug po de dag yongasu spang bar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
239b4(khri brgyad): chen pos ji ltar yang bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar bdag gtam med pa'i phyiraro// sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa la
239b5(khri brgyad): yang de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ga tan med pa'i phyir ro// de la byang chub sems dang / 'i sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang 'chad bar 'dzin
239b6(khri brgyad): par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe no// 'di ltar chos thams cad gtan ma skyes pas// chos gang yod chad pa med pa'i phyir ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' se 'a chen pos ji ltar
239b7(khri brgyad): yang mi bya ste/ 'di ltar chos gang yang mi skye ba de rtag pa dang chad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang mtshan ma'i
239b8(khri brgyad): 'du shes mi bya ste/ 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa gtan med pa'i phyir ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang rgyur blta bar mi bya'o// de
240a1(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des lta ba de yang dag par mi mthong ba'i phyir ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang ming dang gzugs
240a2(khri brgyad): la mngon par zhen par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dngos po de mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming dang gzugs la
240a3(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag pa
240a4(khri brgyad): bzhin gyis med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar du 'ad khams dang / skye mched la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
240a5(khri brgyad): ji ltar yang khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar da / po medadro cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byung
240a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la ldog par zhen par mi bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang khams
240a7(khri brgyad): gsum la chags par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum
240a8(khri brgyad): la chags par mi bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang sangs rgyasu lta ba la brten par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
240b1(khri brgyad): sangs rgya su lta ba la brten pas/ sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyasu blta ba la brten par mi bya'o// 
240b2(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang cho su lta ba la brten par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar cho su lta ba la brten pas chos mthong ba
240b3(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chosu lta ba la brten par mi bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar
240b4(khri brgyad): yang dge 'dun du lta ba la brten par mi bya'o// de ci 'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dge 'dun du lta ba la brten pas dge 'dun mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta
240b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'a dun du lta ba la brten par mi bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang
240b6(khri brgyad): tshul khrimasu lta ba la mngon par zhen par mi 'o'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar tshul khrim su lta ba lo brten pas tshul khrims yongasu dag par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar
240b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrimasu lta ba la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang
240b8(khri brgyad): chos rnams stong ngo zhes bya bas sgying lug par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong gi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de ltar
241a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams stong zhes bya bas sgyid lug par mi bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
241a2(khri brgyad): ji ltar yang stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya ste/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sed
241a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang stong pa nyid rtogs par bya ste/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid
241a4(khri brgyad): kyis stong pa nyid stong gi stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid rtogs par mi byed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' se 'a chen pos stong pa nyid rtogs par bya'o// de la
241a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad yid la mi byed pa'o// de la byang chub se
