241a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ gang khams gsum pa'i sems can thams cad la mi gnas pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
241a7(khri brgyad): po'i 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongasu rdzogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams
241a8(khri brgyad): cad la snying brtsozhing snying rjeb yong su rdzogs pa gang zhi na/ 'didasu ste snying rje chen po thob pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa ji lta sems can thams cad/ 
241b1(khri brgyad): la brnyas par mi bya zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can gyi zhing yong su dag pa'i phyiraro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang zhe na
241b2(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la bsnan pa med pa dang / 'bri ba med pa'i phyir ro// de lo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rtogs pa gang zhe na/ gang
241b3(khri brgyad): chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye bar bzod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag
241b4(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par bzod pa ste/ de ni mi skye bar bzod pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ gang ming
241b5(khri brgyad): dang gzugs mi skye bar shes pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul gcig
241b6(khri brgyad): tu bstan pa gang zhe na/ gang chos gnyis kun tu spyod pa med pa nyid de/ de ni tshul gcig tu bstan to// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par gzhom
241b7(khri brgyad): pa gang zhe na/ chos thams cad bzlog pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba bzlog pa gang zhe na/ gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lta ba
241b8(khri brgyad): thams cad bzlog pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa bzlog pa gang zhe na/ gang bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa
242a1(khri brgyad): thams cad 'dor ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi sa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa
242a2(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes so// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dul ba gang zhe na/ gang khams gsum la mngon par dga' ba med pa'o// de
242a3(khri brgyad): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhi ba gang zhe na/ gang dbang po drug po dag nas rab tu mi 'phro ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
242a4(khri brgyad): shes pa thogs pa gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po'i rjesu chags pa la mi 'jug pa'i shes
242a5(khri brgyad): ba gang zhe na/ skye mched drug la btang snyom su 'jog pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhing gang du dod par 'gro ba gang zhe na/ 'khor gyi dkyil
242a6(khri brgyad): 'khor de dang / der lus ston pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems la 'jug pa gang zhe na/ gang sems gcig gis
242a7(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / sems las byung ba rnams shes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtseb
242a8(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ sangs rgya su lta ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa gang dag gis rnam par rtse zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro la/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi
242b1(khri brgyad): bskyeng ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lta ba gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang ma g.yos la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
242b2(khri brgyad): thams cad na yang snang zhing / de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba de
242b3(khri brgyad): ngag yongasu bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sa la gnas nas/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i
242b4(khri brgyad): phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad yongasu gtong zhing / des rlom sems yang mi byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas la
242b5(khri brgyad): bsnyen bkur bya ba gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ gang chos la ba snyen bkur byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
242b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags pa gang zhe na/ chos kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog po'o// de la byang chub sem
242b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa gang zhe na/ stobs bcu la gnas nas sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongasu rdzogs par
242b8(khri brgyad): shes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par ba gang zhe na/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi
243a1(khri brgyad): sems yong su dag par byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
243a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i ting 'dzin gang la gnas nas/ bya ba thams cad la byed la/ der sems can chos gang la yang mi 'jug pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
243a3(khri brgyad): chen po'i rgyun mi 'chad par snyoms par 'jug pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i ting 'dzin to// de laji
243a4(khri brgyad): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus yongasu bsgrub ce na/ 
243a5(khri brgyad): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji lta ji lta bur sems can yong su smin par 'gyu ra ba de lta de lta bu'i lus bsam pa bzhin du yong su 'dzin
243a6(khri brgyad): pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar bsams bzhin du srid pa nye bar len zhe na/ 'di lnga ste/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir ro// de la
243a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos smon lam ji lta ji lta bur 'debs pa de lta de lta bur 'grub par 'gyur ba dz+ra lta bu zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpo' sems
243a8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yong su rdzogs par byas pas/ smon lam ji lta ji lta bur 'debs pa de lta de lta bur 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sem/ 
243b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa khong
243b2(khri brgyad): du chud pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spobs pa'i klung khong du chud pa ji
243b3(khri brgyad): lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ 
243b4(khri brgyad): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen rabs thams cad du brdzus shing skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma
243b5(khri brgyad): du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems
243b6(khri brgyad): dpa' se chen po rigs chen po dag tu skye ba ste/ do ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' se
243b7(khri brgyad): chen po'i tshe rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sAl
243b8(khri brgyad): chen po lta bu dag tu skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por
244a1(khri brgyad): rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu nga las sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag thung bar gyur pa ste/ de ni byang chub
244a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sen
244a3(khri brgyad): rnams byang chub tu bkod nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor nyid dang ldan pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de
244a4(khri brgyad): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba phun sum tshogs pa gang na na/ skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thangad snang bas khab par 'gyur zhing / 
244a5(khri brgyad): de dag kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa'
244a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag dang
244a7(khri brgyad): khyim nas rab tu 'thung zhing / mngon par 'byung la sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag las nges par 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
244a8(khri brgyad): mngon par 'thung ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub
244b1(khri brgyad): kyi shing gi gra ba ni gse sa grub pa/ sdong po do ni m+bu m+b+hangs grub pa/ sal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma rnams ni rin po ma su bdun las grub pa yin la/ yal ga pa
244b2(khri brgyad): lo ma dang / 'dab ma de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i bar dag tu snang bas khyab par byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
244b3(khri brgyad): chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs
244b4(khri brgyad): pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongasu smin par byas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
244b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongasu rdzogs par phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bcu la gnas pa/ ji
244b6(khri brgyad): ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po dag yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / 
244b7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar dag yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / bag chags dang / mtshams
244b8(khri brgyad): sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yong su rdzogs par gyur pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
245a1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o// rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
245a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sa bcu po dag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams
245a3(khri brgyad): cad la spyod pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag la bslabs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la spyod pa ni dkar / 
245a4(khri brgyad): rnam par mthong ba'i sa la yang dag par 'da' ni rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bslabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod
245a5(khri brgyad): chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub
245a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sa dgu po 'di dag las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems da
245a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu yin no// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// 
245a8(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa los/ sa yongasu sbyong ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o// 'ab 'byor gang khyod
245b1(khri brgyad): 'di skad du theg pade gang nas nges par 'thung bar 'gyur zhes zer ba ni khams gsum nas nges par 'thung bar 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba
245b2(khri brgyad): der gnas par 'gyur te/ de yang gnyi su med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar theg pa chen po grong yin pa dang / rnam
245b3(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang mi yin te/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa
245b4(khri brgyad): med pa ste/ 'od ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la ni nges par 'byung ba 'am/ 
245b5(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ nges par/ 'thung bar gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro// rub 'ar mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung
245b6(khri brgyad): bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid las nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zod// rab 'byor de'izhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par
245b7(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / spang ba'i dbyings dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings dang / 
245b8(khri brgyad): 'gog pa'i dbyings la nges par 'thung bar 'dod du zad// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni khoms gsum nas nges par 'thung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyi
246a1(khri brgyad): ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro// 
246a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad // rab 'byor mtshan
246a3(khri brgyad): nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'thung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid la nges par
246a4(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'dod du zad// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing rnam pazad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi lur
246a5(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir ro// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nasanges par 'byung
246a6(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa tha~Mng mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba dang 'du shes
246a7(khri brgyad): dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas steng pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ 
246a8(khri brgyad): mig gi stong pa nyid la nges par 'thung bar 'dod du zad// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'thung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang / 
246b1(khri brgyad): lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'thung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs
246b2(khri brgyad): kyi stong pa nyid dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid dang / migi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang / rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes
246b3(khri brgyad): pa'i stong pa nyid dang / mig 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa
246b4(khri brgyad): las byung ba'i tshor ba'i stong pa zhing dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te rag ba las byung ba'i tshor ba'i stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung
246b5(khri brgyad): bar 'dod du zad// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mi ga gi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byu nga bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
246b6(khri brgyad): la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyi bar ni khams gsum nas nges por 'byung bar
246b7(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyi// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar mig ni migs stong pa'i phyiraro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 
246b8(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung po'i tshong ba'i bar dag kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la
247a1(khri brgyad): nges par 'thung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ rmi lam la nges par 'thung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
247a2(khri brgyad): rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / brag cha dang / mgo yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa la nges par
247a3(khri brgyad): 'thung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyi nan/ 'byor rmi la ma g+hi rang bzhin ni/ khams gsum nas nges par 'thung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa
247a4(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas por mi 'gyurabadang / rab 'byor de bzhin du sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang / smig rgyu dang / thig cha dang / mig
247a5(khri brgyad): yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin ni/ khams gsum nas nges par 'thung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas
247a6(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rmi lam gyi rang bzhin ni/ rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ni/ 
247a7(khri brgyad): mA'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / smig rgyu'i rang bzhin no// smig rgyu'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / brag cha'i rang bzhin ni/ brag tsha'i rang bzhin gyis stong ba
247a8(khri brgyad): mig yor gyi rang bzhin ni/ mig yor gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i ma
247b1(khri brgyad): bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar
247b2(khri brgyad): 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
247b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du
247b4(khri brgyad): zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'thung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
247b5(khri brgyad): pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa 'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pa
247b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam
247b7(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni sbyin pa'i pha rol
247b8(khri brgyad): phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / de bzhin du sbyor te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
248a1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis
248a2(khri brgyad): stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
248a3(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i
248a4(khri brgyad): byi zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bani na dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar kyi rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba
248a5(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gan sa par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni nang stong pa
248a6(khri brgyad): nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab
248a7(khri brgyad): 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
248a8(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'thung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyuro// 
248b1(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du
248b2(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stob
248b3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar lam gyi bar gyi rang bzhin gang
248b4(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
248b5(khri brgyad): 'byor lam ni lam gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'a byer de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ 
248b6(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag por rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad// de ci
248b7(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
248b8(khri brgyad): nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'bo ro mtshan
249a1(khri brgyad): nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'thung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ dgra bcom pa la nges par 'thung bar 'dod du zad// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid
249a2(khri brgyad): med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
249a3(khri brgyad): ba'i sangs rgyas la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gang
249a4(khri brgyad): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni
249a5(khri brgyad): khams gsum nos nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa ra mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
249a6(khri brgyad): 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin ni dgra bcom pa 'i rang bzhin gyis stong / rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyis stong / byang chub sems
249a7(khri brgyad): dpa'i rang bzhin ni byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis stong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ba'i phyiraro// rab
249a8(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'thung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zang // rab 'byor de bzhin
249b1(khri brgyad): du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'thung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang
249b2(khri brgyad): rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar
249b3(khri brgyad): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'thung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur
249b4(khri brgyad): ba dang / de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bra sa bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi
249b5(khri brgyad): rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams ca da mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / 
249b6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ rgyun tu zhugs
249b7(khri brgyad): pa'i 'bras bu stong pa dang / de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / 
249b8(khri brgyad): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
250a1(khri brgyad): rnams la nges par 'thung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ ming la nges par 'thung bar 'dod du dzadado// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid
250a2(khri brgyad): med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ mtshan ma dang / brda' dang / tha snyad dang / gdags pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du
250a3(khri brgyad): zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gdags pa'i rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
250a4(khri brgyad): nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gdags pa ni gdags pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
250a5(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'thung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye ba med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
250a6(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba
250a7(khri brgyad): med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rang
250a8(khri brgyad): bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir
250b1(khri brgyad): zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ni/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po ni khams gsum
250b2(khri brgyad): nas nges par 'thung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur te/ theg pa de ni/ bskyod du med pa yin no// 
250b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa// bam po bcu bzhi pa// rab 'byor gang khyod 'di skad du theg pa de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni
250b4(khri brgyad): theg pa de gang du yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad gnos ba med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'on kyang theg pa de ni
250b5(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// 
250b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi
250b7(khri brgyad): khyab pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma
250b8(khri brgyad): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin zhing / yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang / bsam gyis mi
251a1(khri brgyad): khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyiraro// desa'i phyi zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni
251a2(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbying
251a3(khri brgyad): kyi rang bzhin ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha'i khams ni gnas pa yang ma yin// 
251a4(khri brgyad): myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang mA yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/

251a6(khri brgyad): de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor na mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am
251a7(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin
251a8(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor na mkha'i
251b1(khri brgyad): khams kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa dang / spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / 'dod chags dang / bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / 'gog pa'i
251b2(khri brgyad): dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar na mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / spong
251b3(khri brgyad): bo'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis

251b5(khri brgyad): ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de ba zhon du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 
251b6(khri brgyad): tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang // 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no//

251b8(khri brgyad): gnas pa yang ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs
252a1(khri brgyad): kyis stong pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mig gi stong pa nyid ni gnas pa
252a2(khri brgyad): yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// yid kyi stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang
252a3(khri brgyad): gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa dang / yid kyi rang
252a4(khri brgyad): bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig ni mig gis stong pa dang / yid kyi bar du yid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//

252a8(khri brgyad): gzugs kyis stong pa dang / chos rnams kyi bar ni chos rnams kyi stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mig rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa 'am/ 
252b1(khri brgyad): gnas pa yang ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa de gnas pa yang

252b5(khri brgyad): pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor

252b7(khri brgyad): pa 'am/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa 'om/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
253a1(khri brgyad): mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i byor/

253a6(khri brgyad): rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar du/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsho

253b8(khri brgyad): nga'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi
254a1(khri brgyad): gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ra

256a8(khri brgyad): ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg po chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin// mi gnas po yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dperan/

256b4(khri brgyad): ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / mtshan ma'i rang bzhin ni/ mtshan ma'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / brda'i rang bzhin ni/ brda'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang
256b5(khri brgyad): tha snyad kyi rang bzhin ni/ tha snyad kyi rang bzhin gyi sa stong pa dang / gdags pa'i rang bzhin ni/ gangag/ sa pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
256b6(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ ma
256b7(khri brgyad): gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par
256b8(khri brgyad): 'du bya ba med pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin// mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin// 
257a1(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon
257a2(khri brgyad): mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir/ 
257a3(khri brgyad): zhe na/ 'di ltar skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba
257a4(khri brgyad): med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis sto pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po
257a5(khri brgyad): par gnas pa'i tshul dang / bskyod du med pa'i tshul gyis pa/ nga du gnas par 'gyur ba med do// rab 'byor khyo nga 'dra skad du theg pa ngos su zhig nges par 'thung bar
257a6(khri brgyad): 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ theg pa de su yang nges par 'byung ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar thog pa gang yin pa de dang / gang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur
257a7(khri brgyad): ba dang / gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyiraro// de ltar chos thams/ 
257a8(khri brgyad): cad med cing mi dmigs pa la/ chos gang zhig chos gang gis nges par 'thung bar 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 
257b1(khri brgyad): bdag mi dmigs pa dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
257b2(khri brgyad): phyir/ de bzhin nyid mi dmigs yang dag pa'i mtha' mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mi migs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
257b3(khri brgyad): phyir/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmi
257b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
257b5(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag
257b6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs/ shin tu
257b7(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bon dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs/ de bzhin
257b8(khri brgyad): du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs pa mi dmigs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
258a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
258a2(khri brgyad): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
258a3(khri brgyad): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ skye ba med pa mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 'gag pa
258a4(khri brgyad): med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa mi rimigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ sngon
258a5(khri brgyad): gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin tu rnam por dag pa'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da lta rwa byung ba mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin tu rnam par
258a6(khri brgyad): dgra pa'i phyir/ 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'chi ba dang / skye ba mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 'grib pa dang / 
258a7(khri brgyad): 'phel ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// gang dmig su med pas/ thams cad mi dmig so zhe na/ chos kyi dbyi ngos med pas mi dmigs// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
258a8(khri brgyad): 'byor chos kyi dbyings dmig su med pas/ chos kyi dbyings mi dmig so// skye ba med pa dang / 'gog pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
258b1(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dmig su med pas/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pa mi dmig so// de bzhin nyid dmig su med pas/ de bzhin nyid mi dngatha
258b2(khri brgyad): so// yang dag pa'i mtha' dimagasu med pas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mi dmigaso// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmig su med pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ 
258b3(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
258b4(khri brgyad): phyin pa dmig su med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nau pa mi dmig so// nang stong pa nyid dmig su med pa sa/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmig so// dngos po med pa'i ngo
258b5(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmig su med pas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmig so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmig su med pas/ dran pa nye bar
258b6(khri brgyad): gzhag pa rnams mi dri mig so// de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dmigs
258b7(khri brgyad): med pas/ lam mi dmig so// de bzhin du stobs bcu dang / mi 'dzegs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
258b8(khri brgyad): brgyad dmig su med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigaso// rgyun tu zhugs pa dmig su med pas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa mi dmigaso// lan cig phyir 'ong
259a1(khri brgyad): bA dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dmigasu med pas/ dgra bcom pa mi dmigaso// rang sangs rgyas dmigasu med pas/ rangs sa
259a2(khri brgyad): rgyas mi dmigaso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du dmigasu med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir
259a3(khri brgyad): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid dmigasu med pas/ sangs rgyas nyid mi
259a4(khri brgyad): dmig so// de bzhin du sa dmig su med pas/ rab tu dga' ba'i sa mi dmigaso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ sa dmig su med pas/ dri ma med pa dang / 'od
259a5(khri brgyad): byed pa dang / 'od 'phyo can dang / shin tu sbyad da/ 'a ba dang / mngon du gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dang / mi g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos
259a6(khri brgyad): gyi smin gyis mi dmig so// gzhan yangs dmig su med pas/ sa bsu mi dmigs te/ bcug zhi na/ gar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / rigs kyis dang / brgya
259a7(khri brgyad): ba'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis dang / bya rngu
259a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i sa dang / sangs rgyas kyis ste/ nang stong pa nyid kyis dang po mi dmigaso// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis dang po mi dmigaso// shin tu
259b1(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis bcu'i bar du mi dmig so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ nang spong ba
259b2(khri brgyad): nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis/ sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mi dmigaso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid dang / 
259b3(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
259b4(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis mig lnga mi dmi gso// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la da ltar spyod
259b5(khri brgyad): pa ni/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sa par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
259b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste btso brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la che da
259b7(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po thog pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di mi lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
259b8(khri brgyad): gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa lagaso/ 
260a1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du theg chen po dmang sems can da ga tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis/ ma ma mchis pa rnargyas kyi go 'byung ba lags te/ 
260a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'dis sde zer na/ na mkha' ni sems can dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis chang ma mchis pa rnams kyi go 'byed ga lags
260a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de ltar na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po lag so// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po de la ni 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro
260a4(khri brgyad): ba 'am/ gnas pa mi dmigs/ sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi dmigs lagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na
260a5(khri brgyad): na mkha' la ni 'ong ba mi dmigs/ 'gro ba mi dmigs gnas pa mi dmigs lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di la yang 'ong ba mi rimags/ 
260a6(khri brgyad): 'gro ba mi dmigs gnas pa mi dmigs lag so// com ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ dus gsu ma mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du na mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha'
260a7(khri brgyad): mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi
260a8(khri brgyad): dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa lags te/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po
260a9(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen
260b1(khri brgyad): po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
260b2(khri brgyad): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// 
260b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thog pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad de dang 'o ba
260b4(khri brgyad): 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas/ rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting 'dzin gyi bar dag ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
260b5(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
260b6(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag ste/ dri ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
260b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs
260b8(khri brgyad): lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
261a1(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg
261a2(khri brgyad): pa chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyi 'di skad du theg pa chen po de ni lnga dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung ba
261a3(khri brgyad): 'gyul zhes smos pa la/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i
261a4(khri brgyad): kham so// rab 'byor de la gal te 'dod pa'i khams de ba zhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / byin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa dang
261a5(khri brgyad): bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / thar zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yi no la dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po
261a6(khri brgyad): 'dis lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir 'dod pa'i khams ni brtag
261a7(khri brgyad): ba/ rnam par bsgrubs pa tshig gis brtan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag mi brtan zhing / the gzugs ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can to// dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma
261a8(khri brgyad): yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'thung bar 'gyur// rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyi
261b1(khri brgyad): khams de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / 
261b2(khri brgyad): brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang mi dang ldam yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
261b3(khri brgyad): gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung badri 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ gzugs kyi khams ni brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs tshig gis bstan pa ste/ de thams
261b4(khri brgyad): cad mi rtag mi brtan zhing ther zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
261b5(khri brgyad): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te gzugs ma da ba'i khams de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / 
261b6(khri brgyad): gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang mi 'gyur
261b7(khri brgyad): ba'i chos can yin la/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'thu
261b8(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na// rab 'byor gang gi phyir gzugs med pa'i khams ni brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa/ tshig gis bstan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag mi brtan
262a1(khri brgyad): zhing ther zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
262a2(khri brgyad): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'thung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gal te gzugs de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin cim
262a3(khri brgyad): log pa dang / de kho na nyid dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la
262a4(khri brgyad): dngos po ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na
262a5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gang gi phyir gzugs ni brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa tshig gis bstan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag mi brtan zhing / ther zug ma yin la 'gyur
262a6(khri brgyad): ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges
262a7(khri brgyad): blar 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang // gzhan ma
262a8(khri brgyad): yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log po dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / bzhi pa dang / ther zug dang / mi
262b1(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba'i chos can lA/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'thung bar mi
262b2(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa ni brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa tshig gis bstan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag mi brtan zhing / ther zug
262b3(khri brgyad): ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos/ lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
262b4(khri brgyad): rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/ gal te mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs
262b5(khri brgyad): dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang reg bya dang / chos rnams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang // / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa
262b6(khri brgyad): dang / migri 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'das te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba dang / 
262b7(khri brgyad): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa lngas byung ba'i tshor ba de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na
262b8(khri brgyad): dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan po dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/ de dngos po med pa
263a1(khri brgyad): ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'thung bar mi 'gyur ba
263a2(khri brgyad): zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa/ tshig gis brtan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag ma brtan
263a3(khri brgyad): zhing / ther zug ma yin la/ 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas// de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
263a4(khri brgyad): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te sa'i khams dang / tshul khams dang / me dang / rlung dang / na mkha' dang / 
263a5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / ma rig pa dang // 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor
263a6(khri brgyad): ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na nyid dang
263a7(khri brgyad): yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/ de dngos po med pa yin na ni/ theg
263a8(khri brgyad): pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'thung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir rga shi ni brtags pa/ 
263b1(khri brgyad): rnam par bsgrubs pa/ tshig gis bstan pa ste/ mi rtag mi brtan zhing / ther zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med cing dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir
263b2(khri brgyad): theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin nyid dngos po yin te/ 
263b3(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byo
263b4(khri brgyad): glang gi phyir/ de bzhin zhing dngos po med cing / ngos po yod pa ma yin pas// de'i phyir theg pa chen po sa lnga dang mi dang lha mi yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rte
263b5(khri brgyad): gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gal te ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos
263b6(khri brgyad): kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni// theg pa chen
263b7(khri brgyad): po 'dis lnga dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / 
263b8(khri brgyad): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyi sa dang / ches gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mkhya
264a1(khri brgyad): ba'i byis dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
264a2(khri brgyad): nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
264a3(khri brgyad): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'thung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med cing / dngos po ma yin pas
264a4(khri brgyad): de'i theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor de bzhin du gal te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
264a5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ba rtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gta na gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
264a6(khri brgyad): pa dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mau dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur
264a7(khri brgyad): ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi drang lha ma yin du/ 
264a8(khri brgyad): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gal te nang stong pa nyid dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po
264b1(khri brgyad): 'dis lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir nang stong pa nyid dngos po medang cing / 
264b2(khri brgyad): dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnon nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// rab 'byor
264b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin du gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po yod pa yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin do
264b4(khri brgyad): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med
264b5(khri brgyad): cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'o jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 
264b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dngos po yin te/ dngos po ma yin na ni// theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas
264b7(khri brgyad): nges por 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ba ni dngos po med cing dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang
264b8(khri brgyad): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// rab 'byor gal te yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga da
265a1(khri brgyad): spobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa dngos po yin te/ ngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po
265a2(khri brgyad): 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir lam dngos po med cing dngos po ma yin
265a3(khri brgyad): pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gal te tshad med pa rnams
265a4(khri brgyad): dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po yin te/ dngos po ma dpa ma yin na ni// theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi
265a5(khri brgyad): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'thung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir/ tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs
265a6(khri brgyad): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po med cing dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lho dang mi dang lha mo yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
265a7(khri brgyad): mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
265a8(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par
265b1(khri brgyad): thung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos
265b2(khri brgyad): balnga ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gal te rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams dngos po yin to// dngos po med pa
265b3(khri brgyad): ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang
265b4(khri brgyad): gi phyir/ rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jag
265b5(khri brgyad): rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gal te brgyad pa'i chos rnams dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg
265b6(khri brgyad): pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gis phyir brgyad
265b7(khri brgyad): pa'i chos rnams dngos po med cing dngos po mi yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lnga dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges
265b8(khri brgyad): par 'drung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra tsam
266a1(khri brgyad): chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / rab 'byor gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dngos po yin te/ 
266a2(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi
266a3(khri brgyad): phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ 
266a4(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir rigs kyis dngos po med cing / dngos po ma yin pas/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zig
266a5(khri brgyad): mnan nas/ nges par 'thung bar mi 'gyur ba zhi go na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ rigs kyis dngos po med cing / dngos po yod ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen
266a6(khri brgyad): bos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'thung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te brgyad pa'i sa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan
266a7(khri brgyad): cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rab 'byor gal te sangs rgyas dngos po yin te/ ngo
266a8(khri brgyad): po mod pa ma yin na no// theg pa chen po 'dis lce dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pi 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'thung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang
266b1(khri brgyad): phyir/ sangs rgyas dngos po med cing / dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par
266b2(khri brgyad): 'thung bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gal te lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lhar mi
266b3(khri brgyad): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
266b4(khri brgyad): dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas po'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro/ 
266b5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gal te sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du bar der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems
266b6(khri brgyad): bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha ngangom dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges pa
266b7(khri brgyad): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du der byang chub sems dpa' sems
266b8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
267a1(khri brgyad): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje
267a2(khri brgyad): bu'i ye shes dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par
267a3(khri brgyad): 'thung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin
267a4(khri brgyad): bas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang l+h+wam yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'thung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
267a5(khri brgyad): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin/ na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis byang chub sems
267a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pog chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par rtogs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyi ye shes
267a7(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thob nas/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab
267a8(khri brgyad): 'byor gang gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
267b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos/ bag chags dang / 'tshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par rtogs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mchog dang ldan
267b2(khri brgyad): ba thob ste/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
267b3(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
267b4(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
267b5(khri brgyad): zil gyis mnan te/ mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
267b6(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin
267b7(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dang / sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
267b8(khri brgyad): rten zil gyis mnan te/ mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne// lhang nge'o// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
268a1(khri brgyad): 'od dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis/ 'jig rten
268a2(khri brgyad): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bas khyab par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od
268a3(khri brgyad): dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
268a4(khri brgyad): gi bye ma snyed dag snang bas khyab par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal ting bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yan lag drug cu dang
268a5(khri brgyad): ldan pa dngos po yod cing / dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhi/ na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas kyi dbyangs kyis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jim
268a6(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag tu go bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
268a7(khri brgyad): kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po med cing / dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs
268a8(khri brgyad): kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag tu go bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
268b1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dge sbyong
268b2(khri brgyad): dam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi 'gyur ba
268b3(khri brgyad): zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa
268b4(khri brgyad): ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge sbyong dang / bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa
268b5(khri brgyad): 'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang ldan par bskor mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// rab 'phye ra gal te sems can rnams dngos po yin
268b6(khri brgyad): te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ gang gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems
268b7(khri brgyad): can de dag phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ sems can
268b8(khri brgyad): rnams dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i
269a1(khri brgyad): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yo su mya ngan las 'da'o// yongasu mya ngan las 'daso// yong su mya ngan las 'da' byar 'gyur ro// 
269a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa// bam po bco lnga pa// rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ theg pa chen po de ni na mkha' dang mnya
269a3(khri brgyad): pa lag so// zhes smras pa ni// rab 'byor nga de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ rab 'byor theg pa ni na mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rnam
269a4(khri brgyad): mkha' la ni shwar phyogs mngon pa med do// lho dang nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyo gas 'tshams mngon pa med do// rab 'byor de bzhin
269a5(khri brgyad): du theg pa chen po de la yang shar phyogs mngon pa med do// lho dang nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / 'tshams mngon pa med de/ de'i phyir
269a6(khri brgyad): theg pa de ni na mkha' dang mnyam po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' ni ring po ma yin/ thung ngu ma yin/ lham pa ma yin/ zlum po ma yin// 
269a7(khri brgyad): mnyam pa ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin no// de'i phyir de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang ring po ma yin/ thung ngu ma yin/ lham pa yin/ zlum po ma yin/ mnyam pa ma
269a8(khri brgyad): yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin no// de'i phyir theg pa de ni na mkher dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' ni sngon po ma yin/ ser po ma yin
269b1(khri brgyad): dmar po ma yin/ dkar po ma yin/ btsod ka ma yin/ shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang sngon po ma yin/ ser po
269b2(khri brgyad): ma yin/ dmar po ma yin/ dkar po ma yin/ btsod ka ma yin/ shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni na mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes
269b3(khri brgyad): bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na// na mkha' ni 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang 'das
269b4(khri brgyad): pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' la
269b5(khri brgyad): ni 'phel ba med/ 'gri ba med/ 'dra ba med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang 'gri ba ba med/ 'phel ba meng/ 'bri ba med de/ de'i phyir theg
269b6(khri brgyad): pa de ni na mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med/ rnam par byang ba med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg
269b7(khri brgyad): pa chen po de la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa med/ rnam par byang ba med de/ de'i phyir thog pa de ni na mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 
269b8(khri brgyad): nam mkha' la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med/ gnas pa med/ gnas pa dang bral ba med/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med/ rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po
270a1(khri brgyad): de la yang skye ba med/ 'gag pa med/ gnas pa dang bral ba med/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni na mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// 
270a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rnam pa'i ni dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ lung bstan du song ba ma yin/ bstan du med pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang
270a3(khri brgyad): dge ba ma yin/ me dag pa ma yin/ lung du bstan pa yod pa ma yin/ lung du ma bstan pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni na mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam
270a4(khri brgyad): mkha' ni mthong ba ma yin/ thos pa ma yin/ dran pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du thag pa chen po de yang mthong ba ma yin/ thos pa ma yin/ dran pa ma yin/ 
270a5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' ni shes par bya ba ma yin te/ na mkha' ni
270a6(khri brgyad): shes par bya ba ma yin/ shes par mi bya ba ma yin/ yo su shes par bya ba ma yin/ spang bar bya ba ma yin/ mngon sum du bya ba ma yin/ bsgom par bya bo ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin
270a7(khri brgyad): du theg pa chen po de yang shes par bya ba ma yin/ shes par mi bya ba ma yin/ yong su shes par bya ba ma yin/ spang bar bya ba ma yin/ mngon sum du bya ba ma yin/ bsgom par bya ba ma
270a8(khri brgyad): yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni na mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta sti dper na/ nomakha' ni rnam par smin pa ma yin/ rnam par smin pa'i chos can ma yin no// ba 'byor
270b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang rnam par smin pa ma yin/ rnam par smin pa'i chos can ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'di ni na mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
270b2(khri brgyad): dper na/ na mkha' ni 'dod pa'i khamasu gtogs pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khamasu gtogs pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i kham su gtogs pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du thag pa
270b3(khri brgyad): chen po de yang 'dod pa'i khamasu gtogs pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khamasu gtogs pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i kham su gtogs pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir thag pa de ni na mkha' dang
270b4(khri brgyad): mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin// zhe sdang dang bcas pa ma yin// zhe sdang dang
270b5(khri brgyad): bral ba ma yin/ gti mug dong bcas pa ma yin/ gta mug dang bral ba ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang 'dod chags dang bcas pa yang
270b6(khri brgyad): ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma yin// zhe sdang dang bcas pa ma yin// zhe sdang dang bral ba mi yin/ gti mug dang bcas pa ma yin// gti mug dang bral ba ma yin
270b7(khri brgyad): te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' la ni sems dang po bskyed pa med/ gnyis pa med/ gsum
270b8(khri brgyad): pa med// baning med/ ldang med/ drug pa med/ bdun pa dang / brgyad pa dang / dgu pa med cing / sems bskyod pa bcu pa med do// rab 'byor
271a1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du theg pa chen po de sems dang po bskyed pa med/ gnyis pa med/ gsum pa med/ bzhi pa med/ lnga pa med/ drug pa med/ 'dun pa med/ 
271a2(khri brgyad): brgyad pa med/ dgu pa med cing / sems bskyed pa bcu pa med de/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni na mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha'
271a3(khri brgyad): la ni dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa med/ rigs kyi sa med/ brgyad pa'i sa med/ mthong ba'i sa med/ bsrabs pa'i so med/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa med/ byas
271a4(khri brgyad): pa rtogs pa can gyi sa med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa de la yang / dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa med/ rigs kyi sa med/ brgyad pa'i sa med/ mthong ba'i sa med
271a5(khri brgyad): bsrabs pa'i sa med/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa med// byas pa rtogs pa'i sa medo// de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
271a6(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med/ dgra bcom pa nyid med/ 
271a7(khri brgyad): rang byang chub med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
271a8(khri brgyad): med/ dgra bcom pa nyid med/ rang byang chub mdo// de'i phyir theg pa den na mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' lo ni nyan thos kyi sa mdo// 
271b1(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa med/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa med/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang nyan thos kyi
271b2(khri brgyad): sa med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa med/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa med/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa med/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam
271b3(khri brgyad): dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' ni gzugs can ma yin/ gzugs med pa ma yin/ bstan du yod pa ma yin/ bstan du
271b4(khri brgyad): med pa ma yin/ thogs pa dang bcas pa ma yin/ thogs pa med pa ma yin// ldan pa ma yin/ mi ldan pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen
271b5(khri brgyad): po de yang gzugs can ma yin/ gzugs med pa ma yin// bstan du yod pa ma yin/ bstan du med pa ma yin/ thogs pa dang bcas pa ma yin// thogs
271b6(khri brgyad): pa med pa ma yin/ ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de la ni na mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na// 
271b7(khri brgyad): na mkha' ni rtag pa ma yin/ mi rtag pa ma yin/ bde ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba ma yin/ bdag ma yin/ bdag med pa mo yin/ zhi ba ma yin// ma zhi ba ma yin no// 
271b8(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang rtag pa ma yin/ mi rtag pa ma yin/ bde ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba ma yin// bdag ma yin/ bdag med pa ma yin// 
272a1(khri brgyad): ba ma yin/ ma zhi ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni stong pa ma yin/ 
272a2(khri brgyad): mi stong pa ma yin/ mtshan ma yod pa ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa ma yin/ smon pa yod pa ma yin/ smon pa med pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang
272a3(khri brgyad): stong pa ma yin/ mi sbyong pa ma yin/ mtshan ma yod pa ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa ma yin/ smon pa yod pa ma yin/ smon pa med pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni namalda
272a4(khri brgyad): dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni dben pa ma yin/ mi dben pa ma yin/ snang ba ma yin/ mun pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de
272a5(khri brgyad): bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang dben pa ma yin/ mi dben pa ma yin/ snang ba ma yin/ mun pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab
272a6(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni 'thob pa ma yin/ dmig su yod pa ma yin// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang 'thob pa ma yin/ dmig su yod pa ma yin te/
