299b5(khri brgyad): la yang nang stong pa nyid med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang ming med la/ ming la/ yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ba
299b6(khri brgyad): ngag med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i'ang ltar ming gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ming gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
299b7(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba
299b8(khri brgyad): de ni ming tsam du zad do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
300a1(khri brgyad): las gud na yang ming mi dmigs la/ ming la yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming
300a2(khri brgyad): gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
300a3(khri brgyad): rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig
300a4(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba de dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam
300a5(khri brgyad): las gud na yang ming med la/ ming yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sangs
300a6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ljon pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ ting 'dzin ces bya ba dang / gzungs kyi
300a7(khri brgyad): sgo rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gung ni yang mi
300a8(khri brgyad): med la/ ming lo yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i lam yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
300b1(khri brgyad): kyi bar gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe da
300b2(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ 'di lta ste dper na bgyi na/ bdag bdag ces bgyi yang / bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lagaso// zhes smra zhes zer ba
300b3(khri brgyad): ni/ tshe dang ldan pa rashA ri'i bu bdag gtan ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dang / 
300b4(khri brgyad): srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / 
300b5(khri brgyad): shes pa po dang / mthong ba po gtan med cing ming dmi/ gas na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba/ lta ga la yod// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs gtan med
300b6(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ 
300b7(khri brgyad): de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par blta ga la yod/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / 
300b8(khri brgyad): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gtan med cing mi dmigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs gtan med cing ma dari
301a1(khri brgyad): na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri drang ro dang reg bya dang / chos rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ mngon
301a2(khri brgyad): par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA raM'i bu mri gi rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 
301a3(khri brgyad): rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
301a4(khri brgyad): ri'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na// de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yo da/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / 
301a5(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
301a6(khri brgyad): tshor ba gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
301a7(khri brgyad): gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gtan med cing mi dmigs
301a8(khri brgyad): de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam/ 
301b1(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
301b2(khri brgyad): bu nang stong pa nyid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gtan med cing mi
301b3(khri brgyad): dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon
301b4(khri brgyad): par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan
301b5(khri brgyad): lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i yam yan lag brgyad ba dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs
301b6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting 'dzin rnams dang
301b7(khri brgyad): gzungs kyi sgo rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ nyan thos gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub
301b8(khri brgyad): par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// rang sangs rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ byang chub sems dpa'
302a1(khri brgyad): gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
302a2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ bdag bdag ces bya ba yang
302a3(khri brgyad): bdag mngon par 'grub pa ni gtan med pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir 'di ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa
302a4(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid lags na zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ ni dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'dus pa las byung
302a5(khri brgyad): ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang gi 'dus po las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
302a6(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid
302a7(khri brgyad): medo// tshe dang ldan pa ri'i bu mig 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las
302a8(khri brgyad): byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri ro dang reg bya dang / chos rnams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang
302b1(khri brgyad): sna dag lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg
302b2(khri brgyad): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA
302b3(khri brgyad): ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
302b4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na
302b5(khri brgyad): chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos thams/ cang ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin// 
302b6(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad mi rtag pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
302b7(khri brgyad): gzugs mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag pa ste/ ga
302b8(khri brgyad): dang yang bral bas ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mi rtag pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad ni
303a1(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ste/ gang dang yang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
303a2(khri brgyad): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar smon pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa dngos po med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad ni dge ba dang / kha na mtho
303a3(khri brgyad): ba med pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'dus ma byas pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yino// 
303a4(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'dus ma byas gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs
303a5(khri brgyad): des na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga zhan yang chos thams cad ni ther zug tu gnas
303a6(khri brgyad): pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin/ rab 'byor gyis
303a7(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor
303a8(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin pa'i phyiraro// de
303b1(khri brgyad): bzhin du dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang
303b2(khri brgyad): nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin ma byas pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams
303b3(khri brgyad): dang / 'khor ba dang // mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan
303b4(khri brgyad): ba shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yi no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir gang mngon par grub pa'i
303b5(khri brgyad): gzugs de gang lags/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang
303b6(khri brgyad): lags zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// tshor ba dang // 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon
303b7(khri brgyad): par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni
303b8(khri brgyad): mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni mngon par
304a1(khri brgyad): 'dus ma byas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyiraro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/ na ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / 
304a2(khri brgyad): lus dang / yid ni mngon par 'du ma byas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs dang / 
304a3(khri brgyad): sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// chos
304a4(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi bar du yang mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam
304a5(khri brgyad): grangs des na/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'dun/ sa dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam sa ni mngon par ma grub pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa
304a6(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skadadu/ ci'i phyir gang mngon par ma grub pa de gzugs ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
304a7(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa ma lags zhes slu zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 
304a8(khri brgyad): rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do// skye ba med cing 'jigs pa med pa gang yin pa de la gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// de bzhin du tshor ba
304b1(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do// gang la skye
304b2(khri brgyad): ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de dag gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// chos thams cad kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gang dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa de dag la skye ba med cing 'i
304b3(khri brgyad): pa med do// gang dag la skye ba med cing 'jigs pa med pa de dag la gzhan du 'gyur ba med de/ rnam grangs des na/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// gang mngon
304b4(khri brgyad): par ma grub pa de ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad/ ci'i phyir
304b5(khri brgyad): mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par mahA ba pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing / rjesu bstan pa brgya
304b6(khri brgyad): lags ma zhes smra shes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mngon par ma grub pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
304b7(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni gnyi su med cing gnyi su dbyer med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
304b8(khri brgyad): bu rnam grangs des na/ kho bos 'di skadadu/ ci'i phyir mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rje su bstan par
305a1(khri brgyad): bgyi lags ma zhes smras// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skadadu/ ci'i phyir mngon par ma grub pa las gung na yang byang chub kyi sladu spyod pa'i byang
305a2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigasu ma mchis pa lagaso zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
305a3(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ mngon par ma grub pa yang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya bar yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ste/ de ltar na
305a4(khri brgyad): mngon par ma grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de dag ni gnyis su med cing gnyi su dbyer med do// mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang gzugs
305a5(khri brgyad): yang dag par rje su mi mthong / mngon par ma grub pa las gung na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjesu mi
305a6(khri brgyad): mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / gzugs de ni gnyi su med cing gnyisu dbyer med do// de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
305a7(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de ni gnyi su med cing gnyisu dbyer med do// de bzhin du mngon par ma grub pa las gung na chos thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rje su mi mthong
305a8(khri brgyad): ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar de ni gnyi su med cing gnyis dbyer med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ mngon par ma grub
305b1(khri brgyad): pa las gud na/ byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmig su med pa yin no// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ 
305b2(khri brgyad): bam po bcu bdun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
305b3(khri brgyad): sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing / yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha
305b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par ba kyi'o zhes sku zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
305b5(khri brgyad): ni/ chos thams cad g.yo ba med par yang dag par rjesu mthong zhing / chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang
305b6(khri brgyad): mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur yang dag par rjesu mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
305b7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dang shing dngang par mi 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tsho dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
305b8(khri brgyad): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog
306a1(khri brgyad): bde'i ga gzugs pas mi 'an tshangs 'dzin la gnas pa ma brgyad pa / mngan pa ldan par ma pa na mas 'dams par ba
306a2(khri brgyad): so// de'i tshe tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi 'gyid cing / 'di
306a3(khri brgyad): ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi 'dogs par mi bgyid lag so// de bzhin du de'i tshe/ mig khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid
306a4(khri brgyad): cing / 'di ni mig go zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lag so// de bzhin du de'i tshe/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas pa
306a5(khri brgyad): mi bgyid/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni yod do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lag so// de'i tshe spyi na pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin
306a6(khri brgyad): la gnas par mi bgyid/ mngon par zhen par mi 'gyid cing // 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lag so// de bzhin du de'i tshe/ tshul khrims
306a7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
306a8(khri brgyad): khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lagaso// 
306b1(khri brgyad): de'i tshe nang stong pa nyid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lagaso/ 
306b2(khri brgyad): de bzhin du de'i tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni dngos po
306b3(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
306b4(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid// mdo na bar zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni dran pa nye bar
306b5(khri brgyad): gzhag pa rnamaso zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid pa lag so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe/ yang dag pa ra spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
306b6(khri brgyad): dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so
306b7(khri brgyad): so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing
306b8(khri brgyad): 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
307a1(khri brgyad): / tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par
307a2(khri brgyad): zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di dag ni ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnam so// zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lag so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sem
307a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzugs yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams
307a4(khri brgyad): yang dag par rje su mi mthong / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par rje su mi mthong / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / sangs
307a5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ba'i slad du'o// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ bcom ldan
307a6(khri brgyad): 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni ma skyes pa ste/ gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de/ gzugs ma lag sa pa'i sla du'o// de ltar na gzugs dang / skye ba ma mchis
307a7(khri brgyad): ba de gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyi su dbyer ma mchis lag so// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i
307a8(khri brgyad): slanga'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lag so// mig gi skye ba ma
307b1(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni mig ma lag so// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni yid ma lag so// sbyin pa'i pha rol
307b2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin po dang / brtson
307b3(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
307b4(khri brgyad): pa ma lags pa'i sla du'o// de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyi su ma mchis shing gnyi su bye mchis lag so// nang stong pa
307b5(khri brgyad): nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ nang stong ba nyid pa lag so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pade
307b6(khri brgyad): ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa ni gnyisu ma mchis shing / gnyisu dbyer
307b7(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi skye bam mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran
307b8(khri brgyad): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyisu ma mchis shing / gnyi su dbyer ma mchis lag so// de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
308a1(khri brgyad): ba dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / 
308a2(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma laDa
308a3(khri brgyad): te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyi su ma mchis shing gnyi su dbyer ma mchis lag so// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas
308a4(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags pa'i sladu'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni ma skyes pa
308a5(khri brgyad): ste de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na de bzhin nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyisu ma mchis
308a6(khri brgyad): shing / gnyisu dbyer ma mchis lag so// de ci'i sla du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gci ga ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i sla du'o// de'i
308a7(khri brgyad): sla de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lag so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos
308a8(khri brgyad): kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ 
308b1(khri brgyad): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ma lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyi su ma mchis shing gnyi su dbyer
308b2(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa'i sla du'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma la
308b3(khri brgyad): te/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyi su ma mchis shing gnyisu dbyer ma mchis lag so// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
308b4(khri brgyad): ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags mang po lag sa pa'i sladu'o// de'i sladu rnam pa thams cad mkhye na ba nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyi sum
308b5(khri brgyad): mchis shing / gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/ gzug/ sa kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma
308b6(khri brgyad): lag so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te de ltar na phung po rnams dang / 'grib
308b7(khri brgyad): pade ni gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyisu dbyer ma mchis lag so// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sgrib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i sladu'o// khams dang
308b8(khri brgyad): skye mched rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni khams dang / skye mched rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / 'grib pa ni gnyi su ma mchis shing
309a1(khri brgyad): // gnyisu dbyer ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na
309a2(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyi su dbyer ma mchis lag so// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
309a3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha
309a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyi su ma mchis shing dbyer ma mchis pa lag so// de ci'i sladu zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
309a5(khri brgyad): 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags bi'i sA ngu ste/ de'i sladadu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha
309a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma la gas te/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de ni
309a7(khri brgyad): gnyisu ma mchis shing / gnyisu dbyer ma mchis lag so// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i sladu ste/ de'i slad du
309a8(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lagaso// de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ dngos pa
309b1(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyi su ma mchis shing / gnyi su dbyer ma mchi so// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ 
309b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma legs pa'i sla du ste/ de'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ 
309b3(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma laDa te/ 
309b4(khri brgyad): de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyi su dbyer ma mchi sa lag so// de ci'i sla du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
309b5(khri brgyad): ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i sla du ste/ de'i sladu dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag
309b6(khri brgyad): pa rnams ma lag so// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
309b7(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ lam ma lags te/ de ltar na lam dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyi su ma mchis shing gnyisu skye mchis lag so// de ci'i
309b8(khri brgyad): sladu zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i sla du ste/ de'i sladu lam gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lag so// de bzhin du
310a1(khri brgyad): du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brtsa
310a2(khri brgyad): brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyi su ma mchis shing
310a3(khri brgyad): gnyisu dbyer ma mchis lag so// de ci'i slang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i sla du ste/ de'i sladu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
310a4(khri brgyad): 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sang sa rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gang yang gzugs shes bgyi ba de ni gnyi su
310a5(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa'i grangasu bgyis pa lag so// de bzhin du gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni gnyi su ma
310a6(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i grangasu bgyis pa lag so// gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de yang gnyi su ma mchis pa'i grangasu bgyis pa lag so// shes rab kyi pha
310a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gnyi su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras
310a8(khri brgyad): so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ ches 'di dag la ni ji ltar nye bar rtog/ tshe dang ldan
310b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/ nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang khyod
310b2(khri brgyad): 'di skadadu/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub gang yin pa nyid sems dpa' yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhe
310b3(khri brgyad): bya'o// byang chub de kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te/ chos de dag la mngon par zhen pa yang med do// chos gang dag gi rnam pa shes zhe na/ gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/ 
310b4(khri brgyad): de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par she/ sa pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la yang mngon par zhen pa med
310b5(khri brgyad): do// de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched rnams dang // rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam pa shes te/ de la
310b6(khri brgyad): yang mngon par zhen pa med do// stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam
310b7(khri brgyad): pa shes te/ de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
310b8(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams 'dzin pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma ga
311a1(khri brgyad): / dag gis 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sam/ gzugs rnams sam/ sgra rnams dang / dri rnams ma/ ro rnams sam/ reg bya rnams sam/ chos
311a2(khri brgyad): rnams ma/ nang dang phyi'i chos rnamasu 'dzin pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skadadu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
311a3(khri brgyad): gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// gang
311a4(khri brgyad): las ring du song zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams las ring
311a5(khri brgyad): du song / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad las ring du song / 'gro ba drug pa las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// sbyin pa'i
311a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
311a7(khri brgyad): pa las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir ring du song
311a8(khri brgyad): ba zhes bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang
311b1(khri brgyad): kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o// stobs rnams
311b2(khri brgyad): dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi
311b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba
311b4(khri brgyad): zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ro'i bu/ 
311b5(khri brgyad): gang yang khyod 'di skad nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
311b6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog
311b7(khri brgyad): go/ gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog// gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya stes mi rtog/ gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes
311b8(khri brgyad): bya bas mi rtog go// gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba
312a1(khri brgyad): bar mi rtog go// gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
312a2(khri brgyad): par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa
312a3(khri brgyad): bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / 
312a4(khri brgyad): mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma/ med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa
312a5(khri brgyad): smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba ra nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin
312a6(khri brgyad): du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
312a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang / 
312a8(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya
312b1(khri brgyad): ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid rtag
312b2(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar mi rtog go// dngos po
312b3(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go// dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du dran
312b4(khri brgyad): banye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du sbyar te/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams
312b5(khri brgyad): dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rna/ mas dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
312b6(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre sa pa bco brgyad dang / tingange 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag
312b7(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes
312b8(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben
313a1(khri brgyad): / zhes bya ba dang / me dben nas bya nga na par mi rtog ste// me dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa
313a2(khri brgyad): spyod pa ni/ chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par byed do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir khyod 'di sa du bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs kyis
313a3(khri brgyad): smyos pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lag so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa sa
313a4(khri brgyad): lags// de bzhin du khams dang / snrem chad dang / na cing pa 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang na steng pagang dag / byang chub kyi phyogs
313a5(khri brgyad): rnams dang / thabs rnams dang / mi 'jigasams dgas pas rag pa ga rnams da 'dzin rnams dpa ga rdzus kyi rna rnams dgas
313a6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags padi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lagaso zhes smra/ 
313a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te
313a8(khri brgyad): skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
313b1(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ skye ba
313b2(khri brgyad): med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i chu rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i sgrub med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol
313b3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa
313b4(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
313b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes
313b6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha
313b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis sta // nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid
313b8(khri brgyad): ma yin te skye ba med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong
314a1(khri brgyad): // pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na dngos po meng pa'i dza
314a2(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/ dran pa nye bar
314a3(khri brgyad): gzhag pa rnams kyi stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin
314a4(khri brgyad): du/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stabs dang / byang chub kyi yan la ga dang / lam dang / stongs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams
314a5(khri brgyad): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ting 'dzin da/  / gzungs kyi sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad
314a6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
314a7(khri brgyad): rnam grangs des na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
314a8(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir khyod 'di skadu/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de dag ni gzugs ma lag so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pan/ 
314b1(khri brgyad): 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lag so// de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
314b2(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / 
314b3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lag so zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
314b4(khri brgyad): 'di ltar 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / gnyisu dbyer med pa gang yin pa dang // 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
314b5(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / gnyi su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang
314b6(khri brgyad): ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// khams dang skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par
314b7(khri brgyad): 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang
314b8(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin te/ de ltar na 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
315a1(khri brgyad): / cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyi su dbyer med pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa/ bstan
315a2(khri brgyad): du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzug
315a3(khri brgyad): ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams
315a4(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pade ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor tso'i phyir
315a5(khri brgyad): 'di skadadu/ gang yang gzugs shes bgyi ba de ni ga nyi su ma mchis pa'i grangasu bgyis pa lag so// de/ bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
315a6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyisu ma mchis pa'i grangasu bgyis pa lag so// gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de yang / gnyi su ma mchis
315a7(khri brgyad): pa'i grangasu bgyis pa lag so// zhes smra/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar skye ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba
315a8(khri brgyad): med pa nyid kyang gzug so// gzugs nyid kyang skye ba med de// skye ba med pa yang gzhan mig/ tshe rab dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma
315b1(khri brgyad): yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gang yang gzugs shes bya ba de ni
315b2(khri brgyad): gnyi su med pa'i grangasu byas pa yin no// gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dngag/ 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyi su med pa'i grangasu byas pa yin no/ 
315b3(khri brgyad): khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / 
315b4(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa ma 'dres pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
315b5(khri brgyad): bu 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/ skye ba med pa yang gzhan ma yi na te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid// 
315b6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni/ ginyi su med pa'i
315b7(khri brgyad): grangasu byas pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
315b8(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par 'gyid pa de'i tshe/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sladu/ gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchin
316a1(khri brgyad): ba mthong lag so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lagaso/ 
316a2(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sla du bdagi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lag so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sladadu sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag
316a3(khri brgyad): dang / shes las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i skye mched mchis pa mthong lag so// de bzhin du shin tu rnam pa
316a4(khri brgyad): dag pa'i sladadu/ khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lag so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sladadu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
316a5(khri brgyad): pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lag so// de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sla du/ tshul khrim sa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
316a6(khri brgyad): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis par mthong lag so// shin tu rnam
316a7(khri brgyad): par dag pa'i sladadu/ nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lag so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sladu/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchi
316a8(khri brgyad): pa mthong lag so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sladu/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lag so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sladu/ yang dag par spong/ 
316b1(khri brgyad): ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
316b2(khri brgyad): dang / gzungs dang / ting 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lagaso// shin tu
316b3(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'i spadu/ sa so skye ba'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lagaso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sadus so'i chos kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lag so// shin tu rnam
316b4(khri brgyad): bar dag pa'i slad/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan cig/ phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi
316b5(khri brgyad): 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang /  gra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / 
316b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lag so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa
316b7(khri brgyad): mthong lag so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar ma gzugs ni skye ba med pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
316b8(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang skye ba med pa yin// khams rnams skye ba med pa yin no// skye mched rnams smra ba med pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med
317a1(khri brgyad): yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams skye ba med pa yin/ stong pa nyid thams cad skye ba med pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun skye ba med pa yin/ 
317a2(khri brgyad): ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba med pa yin/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
317a3(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bco brgyad skye ba med pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa yin/ so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med pa yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang skye ba med
317a4(khri brgyad): pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa 'i chos rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / 
317a5(khri brgyad): phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa 'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 
317a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi skye ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te gzugs
317a7(khri brgyad): kyang skye ba med la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yang skye ba med pa yin na ni/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nyan thos kyang nyan thos kyi byang chub thob zin par 'gyur ram
317a8(khri brgyad): de bzhin du ma so'i skye bos kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tho bzin par 'gyur ram/ 'adz+ra/ 
317b1(khri brgyad): ba rnam pa lnga yang tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ byang chub rnam pa lnga yang thob zin par 'gyu ro// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gal te
317b2(khri brgyad): chos thams cad skye ba med pa yin na/ ci'i phyir rgyun tu zhugs pas ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ lan cig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang
317b3(khri brgyad): zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ phyir mi 'ong bas ni tha ma'i cha dang / 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ dgra bco
317b4(khri brgyad): pas ni gong ma'i cha dang / 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ rang sang sa rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyis ni/ rang byang chub thob par bya ba'i
317b5(khri brgyad): phyir lam bsgom par bya/ ci'i phyir byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi ched du dka' ba spyad pa spyod cing / sdug bsngal ba
317b6(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de dag nyam su myong bar byed/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ni bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa
317b7(khri brgyad): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni chos
317b8(khri brgyad): ma skyes pa las 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa yod par mi 'dong ngo // kho bo ni ma skyes pa las rgyun tu zhugs pa nyid med par mi 'dong ngo // rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod
318a1(khri brgyad): par mi 'dod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa dang
318a2(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang / skye ba med pa la rang byang chub dang / rang sangs rgyas yod par mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu// kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyad
318a3(khri brgyad): pa spyod par mi 'dod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / dka' ba'i 'du shes kyis mi spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar dka' ba'i
318a4(khri brgyad): 'du shes la gnas pas ni/ sems can dpag tu med pa grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'on kyang phar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / 
318a5(khri brgyad): mar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bur 'du shes bskyed ba dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pa na/ sem sa can dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par
318a6(khri brgyad): nus/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ ji ltar bdag bdag ces bya ba yang de ni thams cad kyi zad
318a7(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ phyi dang nang gi chos rnams la yang / de ltar sems bskyed par bya'o// gal te de lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed
318a8(khri brgyad): bar gyur na/ dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par mi 'gyuro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams/ 
318b1(khri brgyad): cad kyi thams cad du chos 'ga' yang mi len cing mi dmigs pa'i phyiraro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni skye ba med pa la ya bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod do// bla
318b2(khri brgyad): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod par mi 'dod do// chos ma skyes pas kyang 'thob par bya ba ma skyes pa thob par mi 'dod do// 
318b3(khri brgyad): ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor cim skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes pa 'thob pa 'am/ 'on te skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa mi skyes pa 'thob/ rab 'byor gyis smras
318b4(khri brgyad): pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa ma yin pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod la/ ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod
318b5(khri brgyad): do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byo ra/ ci 'thob pa yang med la/ mngon par rtog/ sa pa yang med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
318b6(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu 'thob pa yang yod/ mngon par rtog pa yang yod de/ gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa dag ni/ 'jig
318b7(khri brgyad): rten gyi tha skad kyi gdags pa'o// rgyun tu shugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa'am
318b8(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi ba srid kyis gdags pa yin te/ don dam par ni 'thob pa yang med/ mngon par rtogs pa yang med/ rgyu ma 'azhugs pa yang med/ lan gcig phyi
319a1(khri brgyad): 'ong ba yang med/ phyir mi 'ong ba yang med/ dgra bcod pa yang med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ sangs rgyas kyang med do// 
319a2(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ji ltar 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di
319a3(khri brgyad): ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa bzhin du/ skye ba med pa'ang de ltar yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa
319a4(khri brgyad): ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ skye ba yang mi skye la/ skye ba med pa yang mi skye'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang lnga na pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes// chos ma skyeso// zhes bya bar brjod
319a5(khri brgyad): pa spobs ma/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skye sa pa rnams kyi skye ba yang brjod par spobs ma/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ chos ma
319a6(khri brgyad): skyes so zhes bya bar brjod par khyod spo bsam zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos ma skyes chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod pa'i spobs pa yang kho bo la med do/ 
319a7(khri brgyad): chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa brjod pa'i spobs pa yang kho bo la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos ma skyes pa gang yin pa dang / 
319a8(khri brgyad): skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang / spobs pa gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang mi yin/ mi ldan pa yang
319b1(khri brgyad): ma yin zhing / gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstar du med pa/ thogs pa med pa// 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan par
319b2(khri brgyad): 'byor brjod pa yang skye ba med/ spobs pa yang skye ba med/ chos kyang skye ba med de/ gang dag la brtsams te/ brjod par bya ba'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis
319b3(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ brjod pa ni skye ba med pa'o// spobs pa ni skye ba med pa'o// chos ni skye ba med pa'o// gang dag las brtsams te brjod par spobs pa'i
319b4(khri brgyad): chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs skye ba med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du she sa dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang
319b5(khri brgyad): de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu byin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdu
319b6(khri brgyad): dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / 
319b7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang skye ba med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang skye ba med pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'a
319b8(khri brgyad): de de bzhin te/ brjod pa skye ba med do// spobs pa skye ba med do// chos skye ba med do// gang dag las brtsams te/ brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med do// phung po dang
320a1(khri brgyad): khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang
320a2(khri brgyad): ting 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
320a3(khri brgyad): rnams kyi bar du skye ba med do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med do// de ltar na 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis 'gro ba lnga po dag tha dad pa yin gyi da
320a4(khri brgyad): dam par ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhi no// de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs
320a5(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga po dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad gyis tha dad kyi don dam par ni ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri
320a6(khri brgyad): bu 'di ltar don dam par ni las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med/ skye ba med// 'gag pa yang med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang med/ rnam par byang ba yang med pa'i phyiraro// shA ri'i bu
320a7(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos ma skyes pa skye'am/ 'on te chos skyes pa ste/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo na chos ma skyes pa skye bar yang
320a8(khri brgyad): mi 'dod la/ chos skyes pa skye ba yang mi 'dong ngo do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan par byer khyod chos ma skyes pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/ 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
320b1(khri brgyad): bu kho bo ni gzugs ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do// kho ba ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do// de bzhin du khams
320b2(khri brgyad): rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stob
320b3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma dres pa rnams dang / byang chub ma skye ba thob par mi 'dod do// mngon par
320b4(khri brgyad): rtogs pa mi 'dod do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
320b5(khri brgyad): kho bo ni gzugs skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
320b6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sbyar te/ kho bo ni byang chub kyi bar du skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi
320b7(khri brgyad): 'dod do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci sa skyes pa'i chos skye 'am/ skyes pa'i chos skye/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bum skyes pa'ang mi
320b8(khri brgyad): skye la/ skyes pa'ang mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di skyes pa gang yin pa dang / ma skyes pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa
321a1(khri brgyad): pa yang ma yin te/ skye ba med pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar gzugs skye ba med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
321a2(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub
321a3(khri brgyad): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sa sa
321a4(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ lus kyi 'du byed rnams dang / ngag gi 'du byed rnams dang / 
321a5(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ brjod pa skye ba med// slob
321a6(khri brgyad): bskye ba med/ chos skye ba med/ gang dag las brtsams te brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos smra ba rnams kyi
321a7(khri brgyad): mchog tu gzhag pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang dang gang yongasu dris pa de dang / de nyid las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro// dbyor gyis smras pa/ 'di
321a8(khri brgyad): ltar chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i phyiraro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad la mi gnas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
321b1(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de'i nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gci ga med par yang mi rimag so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ tshor ba dang / 
321b2(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmag so// tshe dang ldan
321b3(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyig med par yang mi mag so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du nab dang
321b4(khri brgyad): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzu
321b5(khri brgyad): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyi ga med par yang mi gan so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / 
321b6(khri brgyad): reg bya dang / chos rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ ginya ga med par yang mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i
321b7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du
321b8(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
322a1(khri brgyad): byin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid
322a2(khri brgyad): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
322a3(khri brgyad): kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
322a4(khri brgyad): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gan sa/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmig so// de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul
322a5(khri brgyad): gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de dag ni nang na yang mi gnas
322a6(khri brgyad): phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gcig med par yang mi dmig so// stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
322a7(khri brgyad): bco brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de dag ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad
322a8(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des
322b1(khri brgyad): mchos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir/ mi gnas pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin
322b2(khri brgyad): pa drug la spyod pas gzugs yongasu sbyang bar bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu spang bar bya'o// khams rnams dang / skye mched
322b3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / ting 'dzin rnams
322b4(khri brgyad): dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sa ngas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongasu sbyang ba bya/ 
322b5(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongasu sbyang ba ra bya'o//  lus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin
322b6(khri brgyad): pa drug la spyod pa/ ji ltar byang chub kyi lam yongasu sbyong bar byed/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/ 'jig rten
322b7(khri brgyad): las 'das pa yang yod do// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
322b8(khri brgyad): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'byor 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
323a1(khri brgyad): gang yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ni gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa po dang / 
323a2(khri brgyad): sbyin bdag tu gyur cing / dge slong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs dang / 'gron pa dang / slong mo pa zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ gzhon
323a3(khri brgyad): po 'dod pa rnams la ni gzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog/ me tog phreng 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog phreng / spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos/ 
323a4(khri brgyad): byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa/ gnas 'dod pa 'dod pa rnams la ni gnas/ mal cha dang / stan 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha dang stan/ 'tshogs chas 'dod pa rnams la ni
323a5(khri brgyad): 'tsheg chas/ sman 'dod pa rnams la ni sman dang mi yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag sbyin par byed cing / bu 'dod pa rnams la ni bu sbyin par byed/ bu mo 'dod pa rnam
323a6(khri brgyad): la ni bu mo sbyin par byed/ chung ma 'dod pa rnams la ni chung ma sbyin par byed/ rgyal srid 'dod pa rnams la ni rgyal srid sbyin par byed/ mgo 'dod pa rnams la ni mgo sbyin par byed/ 
323a7(khri brgyad): mig 'dod pa rnams la ni mig sbyin par byed/ yan lag dang nyin lag 'dod pa rnams la ni yan lag dang nyin lag sbyin par byed/ sha dang / khrag dang / rkang 'dod pa rnams la ni/ shad
323a8(khri brgyad): khrag dang / rkang sbyin par byed la/ de la yang gnas shing yongasu gtong bar byed de/ de 'dri snyam du bdag ni sbyin par byed pa'o// 'di ni len pa'o// 'di ni sbyin pa'o// bdag ser sna med
323b1(khri brgyad): med pa'o// bdag ni sbyin pa dgo// bdag ni bdog 'thad yong su gtong ba'o// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o// bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// snyam du sems shing
323b2(khri brgyad): sbyin pa de yang byin nas/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bang gi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'dis sems can 'di dag tshe 'di la yang bde bar
323b3(khri brgyad): 'gyur zhing / len pa med par yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo bar byed do// de ni chags pa gsum la chags
323b4(khri brgyad): shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / sbyin par 'du shes pa ste/ chags pa gsum po de dag la
323b5(khri brgyad): chags shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de ni 'jig rten pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig
323b6(khri brgyad): rten las mi g.yo mi 'phag cing mi 'da' ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten los 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di
323b7(khri brgyad): lta ste 'khor gsum yong su dag pa'o// de la 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ 
323b8(khri brgyad): bdag tu mi dmigs len pa mi dmigs/ sbyin par mi dmigs shing / de de'i rnam par smin pa la yang mngon par dga' ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems
324a1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yong su dag pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ 
324a2(khri brgyad): sbyin pa de sems can thams cad la stobs par byed cing / sems can thams cad kyang mi dmigs bdag kyang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa yang mi dmigs la/ sbyin pa de yang bla ni med pa
324a3(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar byed cing / byang chub kyang mi dmigs pa de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
324a4(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa 'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phag la 'da'
324a5(khri brgyad): ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu myi na pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
324a6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ 
324a7(khri brgyad): bam po bco brgyad pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'jig rten pa yang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod de/ de la 'jig rten pa'i
324a8(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdagi ser sna'i sems tshar gcad zhes dmigs pa la
324b1(khri brgyad): gnas nas/ sbyin pa byin par byed de/ de yang bdag dang / sems can dang / sbyin pa'i 'du shes la gnas shing de bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ste/ dmigs pa la gnas nas/ 
324b2(khri brgyad): phyi dang nang gi dngos po 'am/ zin pa dang / ma zin pa 'am/ ci bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba dang / de sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas shing / lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi
324b3(khri brgyad): dmigs pa la gnas te/ bdag tu lta ba la gnas/ sems can du lta ba dang / dge bar lta ba la gnas shing / tshul khrims dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de dag la brten la/ 
324b4(khri brgyad): tshul khrims dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / byang chub dmigs nas dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba dang / de bdag la
324b5(khri brgyad): bstod cing / gzhan la smod la bdag dang sems dang / bzod par lta ba la gnas shing / sems can tha mas cad kyi nyes par byas pa la bzod par byed la/ dge
324b6(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba dang / de lus
324b7(khri brgyad): dmigs shing bsod nams kyi tshogs dmigs la/ ye shes kyi tshogs dmigs shing bdag dmigs la/ sems can rnams dmigs te/ byang chub dmigs shing / brtson
324b8(khri brgyad): 'grus rtsom pa des rlom semasu byed pa dang / de byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms bsgoms par byed cing / bsam gtan rnams dang / mngon par shes pa
325a1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang snyoms 'jug la/ ldang bar yang byed cing / bdag gi ro myang bar yang byed la/ de dag gis
325a2(khri brgyad): rlom semasu yang byed cing dmigs pa'i lta ba can du gyur nas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad dang / thun mong du byas shing / byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba de ni
325a3(khri brgyad): 'jig rten pa'o// de gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar dmigs la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar dmigs shing / 
325a4(khri brgyad): bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du dmigs nas/ stong pa nyid bsgoms te/ de dmigs pa la spyod cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun
325a5(khri brgyad): mong du byas nas de yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba dang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sdig pa
325a6(khri brgyad): byams cad so sor 'chags pa dang / bdag dang gzhan dag gi bsod nams thams cad la rjesu yi rang ba dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir dmigs nas/ thabs ma
325a7(khri brgyad): yin pas sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa dang / phung po gsum pa'i bsod nams thabs ma yin/ sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du byas nas rnam
